081-158a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ san d+hibyA ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dgongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos/ /shin tu gsal ba'i dus gcig na/ /gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /yod med gnyi ga las 'das pas/ /gnas med pa la gnas zhes bya/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnam bsgom pa/ /'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la/ /thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/ /skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / /tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang / /nyer len srid pa skye ba dang / /rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin/ /nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang / /nga'o snyam rgyal mngon nga rgyal/ /gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal/ /cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas/ /'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams brjod mi lang ba'i grangs/ /brjod kyis mi lang nyid du gyur/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang / /nam mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang / /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ /de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang / /'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung / /tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste/ /phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam/ /sgra sgrogs de bzhin dga' byed dang / / skya bseng skem byed thub pa dang / /sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid/ /de tshe phyung ba gsol ba yi/ /gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po nyid/ /thub chen byang chub sems tshul du/ /mdzad pa gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /rnam lnga mngon par byang

316
081-158b chub pa'i/ /phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/ /gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa/ /bsrung ba'i bslab gzhi rnam bzhi dang / /spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste/ /drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi/ /ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad/ /gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan/ /dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin/ /rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog /bzlas pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin/ /bcu gcig ming du byung ba na/ /phyag rgya gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor/ /bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku/ /nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad/ /de bzhin rig pa spyod grub ba/ /mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa/ /bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang / /phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad/ /phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur ba/ /dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o/ /sgra sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o/ /slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag /chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur ba/ /sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda/ /sna tshogs ming can ming gcig bu/ /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /yang dag mthong nas yongs su bsgom/ /yongs su bsgoms par gyur pa'i bdag /rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya/ /de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i/ /ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad/ /'dod pa'i yan lag 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi/ /rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rgyun de la ni sbyor bar gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir/ /de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur ba/ /srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang / /mnyam

317
081-159a gnas khyab byed ces bya dang / /klu dang rus sbal rtsangs pa dang / /lha sbyin gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba/ /'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad/ /bud med gzugs su slar sprul te/ /rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du/ /de sku'i sku las byung bar gyur/ /de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las/ /rang gi gsang sngags de dag bsgom/ /yan lag kun las nges grol zhing / /shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur/ /dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni/ /zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas/ /rang nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'on kyang 'di ltar thub pa la/ / de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa/ /chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol/ /khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams/ /dngos med nyid ni thugs su chud/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes/ /gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na/ /'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /'jig rten shin tu 'das de bzhin/ /gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos/ /zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba/ /byang chub sems dpas thos na yang / /de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed/ /de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /mgon po rnam snang chen po la/ /de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/ /gang shes bla med byang chub ni/ /ma 'ongs skye bos thos 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba/ /rnal 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /lan gnyis gsol kyang mgon po ni/ /mi gsung bar ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rdo rje can gyis de shes nas/ /de nas slar yang zhus par gyur/ /gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa/ /de ni 'di ltar sngags pas bsngags/ /'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs/ /bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa nyid dang / /lung ni yang dag gang yin pa/ /de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di/ /

318
081-159b gsang ba khyod la bstan par bya/ /'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che/ /gsang sngags kun don sngags ster ba'o/ /der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing / /sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag /lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni/ /gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar/ /rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ /bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i/ /gsungs pa'i don de ma shes pas/ /sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag /de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur/ /don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni/ /sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang / /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /gsang sngags rig ba mchog rnams byed/ /bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge a ni steng du gnas/ /phyi ma zhes bya gnas byas la/ /sngags pas sems can don rnams bya/ /yi ge a gnyis sbyor ba gang / /a sgo las skyes nyid du 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid/ /bdag gis zhes rtogs de 'gyur ba/ /thogs med rtog pa 'di gnas so/ /ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas/ /phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med/ /kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig pa/ /sngags pa rnams kyi thos de 'gyur/ /shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na/ /skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob/ /kun mkhyen kun rig thugs chud pa/ /gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te/ /de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin te/ /gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra/ /sa la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni/ /'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/ /thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin/ /de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas/ /kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa/ /de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur/ /'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung / /mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang / /bsam mi khyab par spro

319
081-160a bdag nyid/ /de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag byung / /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste/ /de yang de ru kun gnas pas/ /bud med chos gcig pu yi gzugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa/ /sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa/ /de ni bud med ces bshad de/ /de bas chos de b+ha ga yin/ /bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad/ /dam tshig chen po gcig tu gyur/ /dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru/ /'di ni de dag mnyam par 'gyur/ /dam tshig sku gsung thugs dang ni/ /ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang / /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang / /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings/ /'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ltar brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi/ /rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen/ /dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za/ /'di dag nam mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i/ /rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs/ /dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khebs pa/ /de rnams der ni yang dag snang / /de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur/ /gang yang dam tshig sngon 'gro dang / /sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang / /don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /'di rnams sku yi yan lag grags/ /zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung / /ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs/ /de ni nyid kyi sku la bcug /de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /de ni rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /nyid sku bud med

320
081-160b nyid du mdzad/ /de nas mgon po bsam yas las/ /bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas spyan 'dra dang / /mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang / /gos dkar mo 'dra'i gzugs dang ni/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / /dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni/ /de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs/ /reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang / /la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams bzhugs/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig dang / /mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang / /'jig rten rgyang pa na gdul don du/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo / /gnyis med mnyam pa nyid rnal 'byor/ /rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog /dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ sbyor gzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid/ /dri ma med par byin brlabs pa/ /kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab/ /'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug /gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su yang / /rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang / /don grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i/ /thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur/ /de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems/ /dngos med ngo bor gcig par ni/ /mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs/ /shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu/ /de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas/ /'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad/ /ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis/ /'gro ba gnyid log sad par byed/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /byang chub sems kyis sad par byed/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig /de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur/ /rig

321
081-161a pa skyes bu'i gzugs dag ni/ /sngags kyis byin brlabs bla na med/ /der ni zhal gsum pa lta bur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyi/ /thugs rjes bzhugs pa las byung ste/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskor la/ /lan gsum ched du brjod pa mdzad/ /bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las/ /spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang / /de 'og gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la/ /ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus/ /phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos/ /'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams/ /rten 'brel las skyes yin par ni/ /khyad chos ston par mdzad pas khums/ /dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni/ /zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan/ /'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po rigs ma lags/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de/ /lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /'od chen ldan bas bka' stsal pa/ / ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni/ /gang zhig khyod kyis nga dris pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so/ /smra ba don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni/ /'jig rten rgyang ba na mchog gzhol 'gyur/ /log par lta ba la gnas te/ /ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed/ /la la glu dang gar la dga'/ /dgod dang sgeg la mchog tu gzhol/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing / /de bzhin 'khrig pa la dgar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang / /de bzhin gti mug la rab gzhol/ /la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhen/ /shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur/ /nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang / /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni/ /skyes bu glen pa za byed cing / /med par smra ba chos su sgrogs/ /ma dang sring mo la sogs pa/ /bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang / /pha dang ma yang

322
081-161b gsod pa dang / /de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod/ /brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang / /khyad par du yang brku ba dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing / /smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur/ /la la dam chos spong ba dang / /de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste/ /sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang / /sngags pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzer nad dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad par/ /'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas/ /zhi ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur/ /'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de/ /mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang / /log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams/ /ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig yang dag thob pa nyid/ /'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis/ /tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas/ /don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang / /de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung / /de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang / /shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring / /rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyid ces/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'/ /sgyu dang bcos ma'i chos dang ldan/ /mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba/ /phan tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin/ /gsang sngags smra ba la brten nas/ /gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /de rnams bdud kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /gal te dngos grub phra thob na/ /des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas/ / mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur/ /tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang / /khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod 'gyur/ /rang las 'bras las byung ba yi/ /phan pa la ni gnod pa byed/ /de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams/ /bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi/ /slob dpon smod cing bsnyen bkur med/ /skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing / /de la skad cig gis rjes chags/ /khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dag ni ston par byed/ /de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar/ /mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /gsang

323
081-162a ba 'dus pa mi shes par/ /dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /gsang ba srung bar mi byed par/ /thams cad du ni ston par byed/ /'jig rten la ni smad byas nas/ /gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed/ /bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni/ /dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur/ /sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskul bas/ /rang la rang gi glags rnyed med/ /de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi/ /ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/ /mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman ba yi/ /sngags pa rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dga'/ /de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas/ /rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs nas/ /lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar/ / dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed/ /de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i/ /gsang ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin/ /dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams/ /'di yis thams cad dgug par bya/ /rang gi rjes rig mi shes na/ /de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur/ /de nas rjes su gzung don du/ /tshul 'di dag ni gyur pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/ /rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin/ /yang dag 'byung bas legs mchod de/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa/ /'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i/ /nyams dga' rdo rje snying po 'di/ /de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /gang yang 'di ltar gsol 'debs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang / /the tshom skye bar byed yin na/ /byang chub sems gzhan ci smos zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs de rnams la gsungs/ /

324
081-162b de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas/ /the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang / /gtso bo 'dir ni ston mdzad par/ /ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de/ /de bzhin gshegs yid bde la sogs/ /ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir/ /de ni yang dag bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po ni/ /de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su/ /ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grags/ /ting 'dzin zhe sdang rigs 'byung ba/ /gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas/ /de nas yang dag phyung ba ni/ /badzra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba'i sngags/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur/ /mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor/ /zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar/ /bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin/ /rdo rje gsum 'dir de bzhin gshegs/ /bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /dam tshig 'byung rdo rje zhes bya/ /ting nge 'dzin la gtso bo ni/ / snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod/ /de nas dzi na dzi ka ces pa'i/ /snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung / /de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa/ /rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni/ /rnam bar snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i/ /zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas rin chen byung ba yi/ /dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/ /snyoms par zhugs nas bder gshegs kun/ /bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di/ /de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya'i/ /snying po dpal ldan de tshe byung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi/ /zhal dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi/ /lho phyogs logs su

325
081-163a bzhugs par gyur/ /de yang byang du gzigs gyur te/ /mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan bdag po de/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag /'dod chags chen po las byung ba/ /rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung / /A ro lika ces bya snying po/ /rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs/ /dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal/ /dpal ldan rigs chen po yi bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ /nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung / /rdo rje de la snyoms zhugs nas/ / snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgud pa'i rigs/ /snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka ces pa/ /rdo rje gsum zhes bya las byung / /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni/ /don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi/ /de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur/ /ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po yi/ /byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur/ /zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni/ /de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang / /'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba/ /'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /dam pa dag ni phyung bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pu/ / yum zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog /sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes byar grags/ /rig pa skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin ma/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs

326
081-163b kyis ni/ /me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes mnyes rdo rje grags/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung / /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni/ /de ni mo ha ra ti ste/ /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang / /rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/ / zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong gcig /gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes/ /bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /bde ba chen po phyung ba ni/ /'di ltar rA ga ra ti phyung / /zhal gsum pa yi gzugs can te/ /gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa/ /de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur/ /gos med ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste/ /rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can/ /bslu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun btsun mo mchog /zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma/ /badzra ra ti zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur/ /de ni phyung ma thag tu yang / /gtso bo rig ma skyes bur gyur/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs 'dzin te/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan mgon po de/ /rnam snang rdo rje las byung ba'i/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje'i gshed/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba dang / /phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon byang rdo rje zhes bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /khro bo chen po phyung ba ni/ /pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita rdo rje can/ /de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni/ /rig pa skyes bur yang dag phyung / /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /'od chen phur bu'i

327
081-164a gzugs lta bu/ /rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa/ /lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas rin chen 'byung gnas grags/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor/ /rdo rje gsum las khro bo che/ /pad mAn+ta kr-iT 'od po che/ /bdag po de nas phyung bar gyur/ /de nas phyung ba tsam gyis 'dir/ /gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'ang / /gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing / /gos med ye shes bla med pa/ /nub kyi sgor ni bzhugs par gyur/ /bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la/ /kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur/ /khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba/ /kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di thos pa dang / /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /de la slar yang zhus gyur pa/ /mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing / /dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dga' ba'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni/ /ji ltar de rnams zhus par gyur/ /'di dag thog mtha' yod min na/ /'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la/ /'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang / /gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces/ /theg pa gsum po rtog pa dang / /so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang / /spang pa dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i/ /zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams sten mdzad pa/ /rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i/ /bya ba de dag phyin ci log /dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni/ /de bzhin gshegs de rnam mdzad pa/ /tshig gcig la ni dpag med don/ /gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni/ /mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni/ /dgongs

328
081-164b pa gsang ba bla med pa/ /dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga/ /'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul gsum gnas/ /pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya/ /ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad/ / de bzhin nyid shes lus su 'gyur/ /zhi ba rnal 'byor ba yi zas/ /ji ltar bzo bos bder gshegs kyi/ /sku yi gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar/ /gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku/ /de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung / /thugs kyi rnam pas thugs su ni/ /zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /phung po la sogs chos rnams ni/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong / /ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs/ /zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed/ /de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /grib ma lta bur byung ba yin/ /de bzhin phung po khams la sogs/ /dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas/ /de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa/ /zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung / /de bas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong / /gsang ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /phung po la sogs chos 'byung ba/ /lus dang ngag sems kun rtog ni/ /phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur/ /'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar/ /de las ting 'dzin skyes par gyur/ /'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor/ /mi phyed rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /zab dang rgya chen rtogs byang chub/ /de rtogs pas ni sems dpar gyur/ /'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa/ /chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o/ /de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /rdo rje theg par ston pa yin/ /ting nge 'dzin ni de nyid las/ /rdo rje'i theg pa byung ba yin/ /'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /dngos don de bzhin nyid gcig pu/ /gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad/ /ma skyes pa las byung ba ni/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin/ /bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de/ /phung po nyon mongs 'chi

329
081-165a bdag bcas/ /'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad/ /lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa gang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur/ / dngos po gang dang gang dag gis/ /phung po lnga po brtags gyur pa/ /de rnams de bzhin yang dag dmigs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /der ni bdag gis bdag mthong ba/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs grags pa/ /de bzhin nyid las spros bya ba/ /chos kyi sku can rgyal ba yi/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ /'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag /de ni dga' bar yongs su bsgrags/ /sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig /de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad do/ /yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis med/ /mkha' dbyings dbyer med rab sbyor ba/ /de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang / /dngos po thams cad bde skyed pa'i/ /yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur/ /zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang / /mthong zhing de las phung po sogs/ /lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba/ /de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin/ /dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog /mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug/ /'on kyang so sor gyur pa de/ /chos kyi sku las zhe sdang gyur/ /bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung zhing / /mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can/ /de nyid dbang po kun byed pa'o/ /dam tshig la sogs 'byung ba'i chos/ /rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang / /der ni gnas pa yang dag bshad/ /de ni gti mug de bzhin sems/ /gang gis ji ltar brtags chos kyis/ /longs spyod rdzogs zhes bya byed pa/ /de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung / /rin chen chen po'i rigs kyi gtso/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags

330
081-165b ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor gyur pa/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma ni/ /de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog /'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod/ /'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'o/ /zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags/ /rdo rje dga' ba'i mtha' can gtso/ /ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med/ /gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur/ / gsum po yang dag 'dug gyur pa/ /gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin/ /pad+ma bgegs gyur khro bo ste/ /mthar 'byed mtha' yi ming can no/ /'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la/ /phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs/ /skrag byed gshin rje'i gshed kyis kyang / /thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rdo rje dam tshig skrag byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs rab mthar byed gtso/ /pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur/ /'chi bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin/ /bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso/ /rigs pa'i bdag nyid can bdag po/ / 'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod/ /dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par/ /gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /des 'di de bzhin bya ba dang / /de nas gsang ba yang dag bsrung / /nu zho zas kyis bu gso bzhin/ /srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso/ /sems can bsam dbang ji bzhin du/ /chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/ /sku gsum gcig tu sbyor ba las/ /bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa/ /bden pa ma yin brdzun pa'ang min/ /zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang / / 'dod chags sna tshogs rigs byung ba/ /dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas/ /gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o// //de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag la/ /slar yang de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /thub chen de la 'di skad

331
081-166a gsol/ /dgongs pa rdo rje dam pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis/ /zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing / /byang chub sems dpa' yongs rtog pa/ /thub nyid kyis ni rnam mkhyen pa/ /de nas byang chub sems kun la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/ /lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang / /de bzhin ngag ni tshig brjod lta'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la/ /ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung / /de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /e ma kun du bzang po yi/ /rten cing 'bral 'byung las skyes pa/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos gnas na/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka min/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /sgom pa dngos por yod ma yin/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje grags/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog /gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems ni thams cad nas/ /de ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /phung po khams sogs rnam spangs shing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba/ /chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung ming can te/ /thog ma med nas

332
081-166b ma skyes brda/ /rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin/ /de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs/ /kun gyi gnyis med mi zad pa'i/ /ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med/ /nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i/ /bdag med byang chub ces bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal/ /bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / /chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung / /byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/ /de nas 'od dpag med mtshan can/ /ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing bsgom pa'ang med/ /nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gdon mi za/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so/ / chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /gzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /byang chub sems ni yin par bshad/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /byang chub sems ni thos pa dang / /dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la gsungs/ /dngos po med cing dmigs med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/ /dngos po yi ni rtog pa skye/ /lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas/ /sems ni de rnams skyed par byed/ /yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar/ /'di la so so skye bo smra/ /thub pa'i gsung ni de rnams la/ /rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed/ /bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'di/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che/ /legs

333
081-167a zhes lan gsum gsungs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs/ /rnam par mi rtog don de nyid/ /rab tu phye ste bshad bar bya/ /tshig tu brjod dang dmigs par bshad/ /brda dang don dam pa yin no/ /rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyi dang / /mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /dngos po'i gsang ba bla na med/ /gnyis med dam tshig rdo rje dang / /pad+ma de las skyed par byed/ /tshig tu brjod pa thun mong ste/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin/ /gsang sngags de nyid ces bya brda/ /de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o/ /dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na/ /gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa/ /de ni bcings med shes bya ste/ /de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste/ /grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla/ /gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba/ /'bras bu phun tshogs grub 'dod pa/ /de ni de nyid grub 'dod de/ /gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan/ /cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas/ /lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bzhi ni gsum du nges par sbyar/ /yi ge oM bcas ring por bcas/ /yon tan sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs/ /thung du ma lus ngag tu 'gyur/ /gcig min du ma ma yin no/ /ya yi don gyis gang yang rung / /bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa/ /ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis/ /'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug /yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang / /gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams/ /bud med skyes pa ma ning ste/ /khams la sogs par rab tu brtag /'og nas steng du bcas par ni/ /shes rab blos ni nges par sbyar/ /drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig /dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung / /de ni ya sogs don sbyar na/ /dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin/ /'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mthar bya/ /

334
081-167b brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag /dngos med ngo bo las byung ba/ /de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs/ /lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang / /brda yis de nyid gsum gnas pa/ /rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ming med brjod du med pa ste/ /byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no/ / gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa/ /'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/ /'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste/ /rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa/ /dus gsum mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i/ /rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan/ /de nyid kho na don dam ste/ /so so rang rig mtshan nyid do/ /de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'byung yang / /rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can/ /gang 'di byang chub sems bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur/ /'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang / /rigs kun la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /sreg dang skems dang bde can dang / /kun zar 'gyur ba'i me bzhin no/ /'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar/ /sems can la la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de/ /'gro ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing / /gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa/ /byams pa chen po de bskyed bya/ /phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /des ni snying rje cher gyur nas/ /des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms/ /sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag /byang chub sems la ma mthong na/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /'khor ba dngos po yod min la/ /sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra/ /byang chub sems ni mthong nas ni/ /btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing / /slar yang de don mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad che la zhus/ /'khor dang cig shos zhes bya ba/ /'di kun byang chub sems yin na/ /ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni/ /phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la/ /gnyis su 'gog

335
081-168a byed gang yang med/ /gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung / /mi mthun phyogs su ji ltar snang / /dman dang bar ma de bzhin mchog /'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pas/ /sems can kha cig gzir ba dang / /byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar gyur/ /de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par/ /ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba/ /'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/ /byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir/ /dgongs pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa/ /shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems/ /de ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig /sngon gyi mthar thug de bzhin te/ /sems de mngon du byas nas ni/ /ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin/ /sems ni de yis ma mthong bas/ /lta ba so sor gyur pa yin/ /de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru/ /'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur/ /des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang / /dbang phyug che la kun du sten/ /zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi/ /kun du spyod pa de rnams byed/ /sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang / /dga' ldan gyi ni gnas dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang / /lta bas skad cig dag gis 'gro/ /yi dgas su yang 'gro ba dang / /'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro/ /gang tshe ma rig kun bsten pas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so/ /'du shes can dang 'du shes med/ /sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa/ /de rnams rlung las byung ba ste/ /rlung las slar yang 'gag pa yin/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang / /rang gi rnam par rtog par lhung / /de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du/ /sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro/ /mi rtog pa yi sems de ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang / /de ni phyin ci log gyur pas/ /khyi dang ce spyang glang po dang / /sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni pha nyid dang / /ma yi rigs ni smyig mkhan dang / /sme sha can dang rigs ngan

336
081-168b dang / /bza' dang mi bza' bya kun dang / /byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur/ /bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes/ /byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phung sogs dngos po med gyur las/ /rang gis myong bar shes par gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad/ / kun mkhyen pa ni byang chub sems/ /nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid/ /tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni slar gsol pa/ /'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni/ /byang chub sems ni rab gsungs na/ /ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs/ /lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir/ /khyed kyis chos rnams ston mdzad na/ /ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid/ /lta ba de ni rab brtan 'gyur/ /dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pa rnams/ /gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs nas/ /gsungs pa 'di las gzhan min zhes/ /de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa/ /khyed gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa/ / dri bar byed pa legs so legs/ /byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing / /nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyi srog gyur gang / /lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa/ /ngo bo nyid rnam gsum du gyur/ /rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems/ /dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin/ /ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las/ /rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul sogs las byed pa/ /'dir ni de la rten pa yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams/ /de nyid gsum gnas la rten nas/ /de kun byang chub sems kyis byed/ /ji srid 'jig rten gdags pa dang / /de bzhin btags pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rnam rtog byang chub sems shes pa'i/ /rlung las rtag tu 'byung ba yin/ /bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi/ /sa bon lta bur bshad pa yin/ /

337
081-169a byang chub sems kyi ngo bo 'di/ /phung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam/ /shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par/ /bdag por rang nyid zlos pa de/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu/ /dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas/ /nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang / /ming ni de bzhin nyid ces bya/ /dbyangs kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad/ /ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dbye ba las/ /de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya/ /e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung / /de nyid gzhan las de nyid gsal/ /de las 'jig rten pa yi brda/ /myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni/ /byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang / /gtso bo rnam snang chen po las/ /khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa/ /sems can thams cad skyed pa po/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni/ /de bas dngos po med gyur kyang / /srid pa dag tu rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa/ /legs par rjes su myong mdzad pa/ /'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po/ /skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol/ /sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig /shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes/ /ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag /yin zhes smra zhing byas pa 'jig /des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems/ /ji bzhin don du mi shes so/ /de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni/ /skal med chos kun rnam spangs la/ /rig pa yang ni mi mthong bas/ /de rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur/ /de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi/ /de ni smra bar rigs pa yin/ /'brel pa'i nyi ma thob pa ni/ /ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don/ /slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa/ /nang na ma yin phyi rol

338
081-169b min/ /gnyi ga ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin/ /rtag pa ma yin skad cig min/ /de ni so so rang rig yin/ /mi rtog nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'byung / /'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang / /da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang / /sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin/ /rig byed dus dang me yi brda/ /nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te/ /bzhi phyed gsum pa dag las byung / /byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid/ /de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel/ / de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang / /ha ni so la gnas pa yi/ /gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin du/ /ming ni yod pa ma yin pa/ /de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa/ /bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin/ /lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni/ /tsheg drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no/ /rang nyid ldog par byed pa'i mchog /de ni srog dbang yid kyang yin/ /nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo/ /de dang ldan pa byang chub sems/ /bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung / /yod med rab tu zhi ba can/ /dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni/ /rang rig gcig bu'i yul yin no/ /de nyid don ni rig byed pa/ /dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di/ /chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas/ /byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad byung legs skyes nas/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos ni ston mdzad pa/ /dngos kun dag pa'i don gcig pu/ /dag pa de nyid don dag ster/ /rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag med chos las yang dag byung / /byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs byed pa/ /ngo bo med cing dmigs su med/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun bzang gcig las yang dag byung / /dgongs don byang chub ster ba bo/ /byang chub spyod mchog rdo rje mchog /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag

339
081-170a pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung ston la dad bar/ /gang gang yid ni bzod gyur pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyis rdo rje las/ /des ni de bzhin bya ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/ /yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa/ /le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// //de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje/ /gsum dang tshul gsum lam gsum mchog /rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs/ /rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi/ /le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /phra mo rnal 'byor dag la bzhugs/ /oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan/ /shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste/ /dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin/ /badzra zhes bya bzhi pa'o/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a ha~M zhes pa drug par brjod/ /de ltar bde gshegs drug po ni/ / skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin/ /o~M shU n+ya tA zung dang po/ /dz+nyA na badzra gnyis pa yin/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M gyur/ /de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o/ /de nyid gsum ni gcig gyur par/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni/ /'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po/ /yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po'o/ /'dod yon lnga yis kun du khyab/ /mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa/ /mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya mchog / de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan/ /yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi/ /phyag rgya yang ni rnam par bsgom/ /mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che/ /tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang / /dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang / /tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang / /de bzhin don yod gzugs

340
081-170b can rgya/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta'i/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs/ /de yi phyag na rdo rje che/ /rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mar ka ta yi 'od 'dra ba/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab/ /rin chen de la rnam par bsgom/ /'dod chags chen po rdo rje can/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra zhing / /thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan/ /phyag na pad+ma bsnams par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za/ /'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams par bsgom/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bshad pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag pos thos nas ni/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang / /de bzhin gshegs bdag la zhus pa/ /phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na/ /mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bu/ /de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /cig shos phyi rol du bsgom pa/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas ming can ni/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos po la/ /sgom pa po rnams ji ltar brtag / mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol zhes/ /gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni/ /'di ltar mchog tu'ang som nyi 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje grags ldan pa/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes/ /'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /rnam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur pa/ /chos ni yang dag sdud gyur gang / /ji lta ji ltar ston par byed/ /phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur/ /byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung / /de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa/ /de nyid gnyis

341
081-171a med sbyor bas so/ /ston dang 'jog pa po 'di ni/ /blo yi dngos grub ston pa po/ /thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni/ /phra mo zhes ni bya bar brtag /mi gsal gsal bar yang dag sbyor/ /dngos med ngo bo las skyes pa'o/ /gzod ma nyid nas rab grub pa/ / gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/ /rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste/ /dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung / /bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /dmar dang nag dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste/ /bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang / /gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri/ /de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas/ /zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min can/ /steng dang thad ka mnyam dang 'og /ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs/ /me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang / /chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la/ / bcwa brgyad dag tu yang dag bshad/ /de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad/ /ji ltar 'o ma khyad par ni/ /mar sar gnas par gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la/ /zhi ba nyid ni de gnas so/ /gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos/ /mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin/ /mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin/ /rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin/ /'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag /de bzhin nyid ni zhi zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya/ /rnal 'byor ba yi dbugs rngub dbyung / / sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid/ /shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ /bya ba thams cad nyid du yang / /rnal 'byor rig bas nyal sogs la/ /ming mang brjod du med pa dang / /dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla/ /gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa/ /brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga/ /bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yis/ /sbyor bzhis bsdus pa brgya phrag dgu/ /dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni/ /de ni so sor 'byung ba las/ /nyi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o/ /de 'dir gsang

342
081-171b ba dgongs pa yis/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin/ /klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi/ /'on kyang bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la/ /rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus/ / gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro/ /thams cad mi rtog par 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nyid gsum nyid med sbyor ba/ /de ni phra mo'i rdo rje bsgom/ /myur ba la sogs gsum spangs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur/ /de ni bdag rig yid ches shing / /zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor gtso spangs te/ /log pa'i rnal 'byor kun du bsten/ /ston pa po yi sbyor smra zhing / /phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni/ /ma 'ongs dus na spong 'gyur ba/ /de nyid de ni nges par byed/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /chos dbyings ngo bo nyid ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni/ /snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad/ /dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjer bshad/ /khyad par du ni byin rlob pa/ /gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas/ /de ni yang dag bshad par bya/ /oM ni dang por shes par bya/ /d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o/ /d+hA tu zhes bya gsum par bshad/ /swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o/ /At+ma kaHni lnga pa yin/ /a ha~M du gyur drug par 'dod/ /sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu/ /bsgom pa bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /nyams dga' ri rab rtse mo ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag par bsgom/ /rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro/ /mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang / /pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha mchog /byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnams/ /

343
081-172a spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro/ /phra mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yang / /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dngos la brtson pas rin chen bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du bri bar bya/ /'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog gi/ /phra mo rdo rje gsum bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o/ /dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi/ /lung ston dam pa 'di la ni/ /gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin byed pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rdo rje phra mo de nyid las/ /'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog /le'u gsum pa nyid yin no// //de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad/ /gnyis su med par gyur nas ni/ /slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la/ /bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa/ /chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bshad du gsol/ / yongs su rdzogs par yang dag brgyan/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /ye shes spyod pa'i don las byung / /zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba bo/ /kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog /dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag /sems ni kun du bzang po nyid/ /sems can kun gcig che ba'i mchog /dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /khams gcig khams ni gsum pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po/ /nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la/ /thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to/ /de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /rdo rje ye shes

344
081-172b rab 'dra ba/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bdag nyid mchog /legs bsgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o/ /sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni/ /tshad ma bzang por de bshad do/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag / gnyis su med pa mdzes pa yin/ /shes rab 'di ni thig yin te/ /thabs ni de yi rjes 'jug pa'o/ /shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin/ /bsdu ba'i dngos grags sgo yin te/ /re re'ang bzhi bzhi ming can no/ /chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda/ /'khor lo nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mi phyed ye shes mtshan ma de/ /rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya/ /rnam pa lnga yis rab bye ba'i/ /rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o/ /shar nas me long ngo bo ni/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /lho ru kun mnyam ye shes yin/ /gcig gi ming can rin po che/ /nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin/ / 'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa/ /bya ba sgrub pa ral grir 'gyur/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog /shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te/ /sprin sngon dang ni mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba/ /mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje/ /nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba/ /dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin/ /byang shar ut+pal ltar snang ba'i/ /btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra/ /de bzhin shar sgor sbyin pa ni/ /tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas/ /de bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa/ /dbyig pa 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar/ /nub tu don spyod ces bya ba/ / rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o/ /don mthun pa ni rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'khyil pa'i rdo rje can/ /phyag rgya dgod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /'di ni legs par bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni/ /rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin/ /dang por chen po yod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i

345
081-173a dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang / /shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung / /de tshe zla zer phreng ba yi/ /skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas/ /lo grangs bcu drug pa yi ming / /ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni/ /bud med ces ni nges par bshad/ /zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa/ /mdangs bzangs 'od ni yin par gsungs/ /rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te/ /ye shes kha bye me tog go/ /dngos po med pa rigs yin te/ /kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do/ /chos dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni/ /shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par bya/ /nang na ma yin phyi ma yin/ /gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min/ /gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur/ /de bas mA ma kIr bshad do/ /de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa/ /byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do/ / nam mkha' dang ni gcig tu mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /de bas yul du rnam brtags pa/ /bsdu ba dag ni bshang ba yin/ /ye shes dbang po stong pa gci/ /rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag /rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags pa/ /de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste/ /dngos med pa ni dbul ba yi/ /de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /khyad par du ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /gang yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa/ /de rnams ji skad bshad pa nyid/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa/ / sar pa nyid du bkal legs dang / /shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis mkhas pas thig gdab bo/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba/ /khru ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la/ /ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan/ /rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste/ /de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'di na 'jig rten pa rnams rtog /gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas/ /de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba/ /dngos med pa ni 'dzin pa dag /yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs/ /

346
081-173b dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/ /len pa ma yin gtong ba min/ /med pa ma yin gnas ma yin/ /blo ldan kun du 'di shes pa/ /rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni/ /nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad/ /dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur na/ /de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni/ /ji ltar gnas pa de ltar byed/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las/ /de las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /le'u bzhi pa nyid yin no// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /rdo rje gsung gtso 'gro ba'i bla/ /slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /sngags spyod don gyi de nyid zhus/ /sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa gcig /khyad par du ni bsrung bslab pa/ /de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung / / spyod pa bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig /gsan nas 'gro ba'i don gcig pu/ /gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to/ /mi rtog don las yang dag byung / /zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin/ /dngos med la gnas gti mug ste/ /'dod chags 'dod chags las byung ba/ /'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin/ /theg pa mchog ni bla med pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ /'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad/ /dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub bo/ /rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya/ /smyig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin/ /mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste/ /gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po/ /theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/ /theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can sdig chen byas pa dang / /gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po/ / gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis/ /bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid dad pas myur du ni/ /zhe sdang dag la gnas pas gnas/ /gang gis phung sogs dngos med par/ /zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas/ /de ni srog gcod byed pa ste/ /theg pa

347
081-174a mchog la gnas pa yin/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag /rten 'byung gnyis su ston pa ni/ /de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste/ /gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang / /de ni rdzas su shes bya ste/ /de 'phrog ngang tshul gang yin pa/ /gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod/ /gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa/ /de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba/ /sems can de de 'dod la dga'/ /bsgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur/ /de yi stong nyid gti mug la/ /yul ni bshang ba zhes grags te/ /dbang po gci ba zhes bya la/ /de dag zhi ba za ba yin/ /theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir/ /de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/ /de dag tshe brdzun 'dod pa dang / /bshang gci zas su byed pa po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab/ /chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /dngos med ces bya 'dod spyod pa/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin/ /de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya/ /bshang gci zas su byed pa yi/ /sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo ni/ /'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas/ /theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la/ /dngos grub rgya chen des thob bo/ /ji ltar mi rtog nam mkha' ni/ /kun du khyab par gnas gyur ba/ /'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de/ /ting 'dzin bsam khyab ces bya ba/ /de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba/ /rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can no/ /sangs rgyas yum gyi ye shes la/ /'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor gcig gis/ /myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung ni/ /sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur/ /'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs

348
081-174b 'khor nang du gsung / /'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang / /gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang / /zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i/ /rigs kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing / /gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa dang / /'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa/ /'dir ni de byed sems can rnams/ /snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam/ /de nas mgon po thugs rje can/ /sems can kun la phan dgyes pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa/ /'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa/ /sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa/ /chu khams rtog dang bral ba po/ /sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag po me yi gzugs can te/ /thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor/ /de bzhin phyi nang bdag nyid mchog /'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu/ /bcom ldan sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs/ /thams cad snang zhing zab pa po/ /de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par/ /bsgoms na rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ /snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing / /sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin/ / de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa/ /brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyam de/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de thams cad/ /gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to/ /de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung / /gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru/ /gzigs nas gtso la 'di skad gsol/ /mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bar/ /'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol/ /mi g.yo ba ni gsang ba ste/ /zhi ba gcig pu bde ba'i mchog /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa/ /'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med/ /

349
081-175a yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa'i dbye ba yis/ /bye brag mang por gyur ba yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs la sogs pa mtha' yas te/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur/ /de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang / /zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes lus can ye shes can/ /brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni/ /yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang / /'gro ba zhes ni grags bdag pa/ /de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu/ /'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur/ /des ni bden 'di ma shes pas/ /dbyangs bcas rgyal la bskul ba ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /brgyal ba zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas gsung ba rdo rje gsum/ /dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad/ /gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje/ /'gro la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ /'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yis/ /'od gang chen por gyur pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges reg pas/ /rang gi stan la gnas par gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang / /dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o chos e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag dag /chos kyi rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don/ /dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung / /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs/ /dus gsum dag gi lam du byung / /rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs longs

350
081-175b spyod/ /nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs ni nam mkha' ste/ /spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan/ /de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa/ /spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig spyod mchog 'di ston pa/ /gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag /de ni ci dga' bar yang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog /sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa yi/ /spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// //de nas dpal chen mi bskyod pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /thugs byin brlab pa zhes bya ba'i/ /gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /oM zhes bya ba dang por yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /tsit+ta gsum par yongs su brtag /badzra bzhi pa'i gong mar ldan/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a ha~M dus kyi ming can yin/ /sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung / /oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /kA ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste/ /badzra rig byed yin par bsgrags/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaH'dod lha/ /a ha~M skem byed ces brjod de/ /dgongs pa yis ni yang dag brtags/ /shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya/ /de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i/ /kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa gsungs/ /oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /wA ka ces bya ba gsum pa yin/ /badzra dus kyi ming du 'gyur/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHlnga pa/ /a ha~M zhes pa drug pa ste/ /gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams/ /re re zhing drug gsum du bshad/ /thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung / /rim ni rim pa min pas gsungs/ /bdag

351
081-176a po las ni gcig pu las/ /rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung / /yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung / /de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /de bas 'di ni bsgom pa mchog /g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya/ /'di bshad pa yi blo ldan pa/ /rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing / /sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang / /sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM ni zung gi dang por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta zung / /de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs/ /thams cad me long ming can no/ /a nu rA ga skye med de/ /de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs/ /rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i/ /badzra yang ni bzhi bar gyur/ /dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming / /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid/ /a ha~M so so rdzogs longs spyod/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa/ /mtshon pa drug pa'i ming can no/ /dngos med gnas pa'i bdag nyid can/ /de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog /de lta'i chags pas de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po thams cad mnyes par bya/ /de nas dpal chen gdon mi za/ /don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te/ /des ni gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan/ /sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis/ /pU dza rnam par thar pa'i ming / /badzra sems ni rnam bsgom pa/ /swa b+hA bAt+ma kaHzhes bshad/ /a ha~M pha rol phyin zhes bya/ /lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings/ /de dag dngos med gyur byas pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin/ /mig sogs shes las yang dag byung / /mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes/ /mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid

352
081-176b thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po/ /thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la/ /gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa/ /de nyid gsum la nyer sbyor ba/ /dngos grub rab mchog des thob 'gyur/ /bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing / /lus dang ngag kyang rnam par bsgom/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas bsgom zhing / /sbyor ba rnam gsum rdzogs par bya/ /rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs na/ /shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa med cing byang chub med/ /rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du/ /mdor na rnam par brtags nas su/ /sngags la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /kun mkhyen sangs rgyas kun mchog gis/ /bsgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms nas/ /phra mo'i rnal 'byor brtsam par bya/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam/ /sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can/ /rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan/ /de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /blo ldan ye shes kyis brtags pa'i/ /gsang ba'i ye shes gnas bsgom mo/ /gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste/ /de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te/ /de yi steng du gnas gzhag go/ / dbang phyug chen po skem byed de/ /gzhi phyed nam mkhas mtshon pa dag /bdud rtsi zhes ni btags pa gang / /de ni hU~M zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsgom/ /spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor/ /rdo

353
081-177a rje pad+mo gnyis bsgom pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis/ /de yi steng du rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgom/ /sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas dgod pa/ /'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor/ /ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che/ /nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis/ /ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad tsam/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse/ /byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya/ /'khor lo la sogs bsgom pa ni/ /de yi khyad par dag tu brtags/ /yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /byang chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o/ / sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub bzhugs/ /mdor na de ni spro bar bya/ /gang tshe chos ni legs mtshan pa/ /rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po/ /dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog /'gro kun don du ston pa po/ /gsung bas mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang / /zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni/ /skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad/ /zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin/ /dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o/ /skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste/ /dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs/ /gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom/ /mchod chen de ni byas nas su/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par bsgom/ /yul dang dbang po sems dpa' ni/ /bshang gci zas su byed pa po/ /byas na de 'dra'i dngos grub ni/ /bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o/ /de nyid 'di ni bla med pa/ /byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o/ /rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing / /mi rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ma ni mA ma kIr bshad de/ /

354
081-177b sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o/ /bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa/ /sha zhes bya bar de bshad do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni/ /sha chen de ni yin par bshad/ /gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog /rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub/ /dam tshig chen po glang chen rta/ /de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha/ /phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas/ /gang gsungs mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i mid gcig bu/ /'jig rten rgyang pa na 'jig rten pa/ / bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtag pa dang / /de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /'di dag zas su kun du bshad/ /de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das las thos pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po/ /lag na rdo rjes tshig gsol ba/ /nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang / /phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing / /mgon khyod 'jig rten pa dang ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs/ /chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa/ /ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len/ /ji ltar skom pas gdungs pa yi/ /skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung / /de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung / /dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du/ /gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis/ /grags ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /bu khyod legs so cher legs te/ /bye brag gsum khyod la bshad bya/ /rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang / /de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams/ /'di dag 'jig rten ba rnams te/ /bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor grub nas 'jig rten gnas/ /'jig

355
081-178a rten 'das par gyur pa yin/ /de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang / /de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin/ /gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das/ /rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/ /de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig /'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/ / brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing / /blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /byang chub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyug dang / /rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzi ldan stobs kyis phyug pa dang / /mdangs bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed/ /gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin/ /de nyid sngags kyi gsang ba 'di/ / rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog /dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ /skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa/ /gsang ba yang dag srung ba po/ /de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun dam pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlab pa'i/ /le'u drug pa yin par bshad// //de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang / /dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig /ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog /mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so/ /de nyid dam tshig bzhi po gang / /'dod pa thams cad ces de bshad/ /de rnams longs spyod ldan pa yis/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya/ /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya/ /de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid/ /dka' thub myur ba de yin la/ /sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod/ /mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang / /gzugs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod/ /de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po rnams myur

356
081-178b du 'grub/ /tha dad yi ge slong mo yin/ /de 'don pa ni za ba ste/ /gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de/ /de dag slong mo za bar 'dod/ /dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing / /sdom pa mi bzad nyid kyang min/ /'dod gsum de nyid longs spyod cing / /sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams bzlas/ /rdo rje gsum dbye bde gnas na/ /sngags rig byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang / / mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing / /byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya/ /de ltar gzugs la gsum shes nas/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso/ /dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /'dod chags chos ni 'dzin pa'i gtso/ /ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid don yod rdo rje grags/ /sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/ /reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mi bskyod me long gzugs can no/ /nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang / /gnyi ga rjes su mi dmigs pa/ /gzugs la sogs gsum de yin te/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la/ /sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa 'di/ /snying po sangs rgyas kun bskyed de/ /mkhas pas gzugs sgra la sogs

357
081-179a pa/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs su bsgom pa ni/ /bsgom pas der ni bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bshad/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang / /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum bsgom rnal 'byor pas/ /rdo rje rjes dran bsgom pa'o/ /rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang / /chos dang longs spyod sprul skur byung / /rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur ba/ /de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o/ /de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig /rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid/ /lha rnams rjes dran sbyor pa ste/ /de bsgom byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi/ /ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs/ /de nyid lo yi grangs yin te/ /bcu drug par ni yongs su brtag / sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi/ /bud med lo grangs bcu drug pa/ /gzugs bzang phra dang mchod pa ni/ /dben pa zhes bya brtsam par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba/ /khyad par gsum zhes bya ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che/ /spyan sogs nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /yi ge hU~M dang de bzhin oM/ /phaT kyang der ni bsgom par bya/ / de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid/ /ci rigs par ni rnam par spro/ /'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste/ /gsang dang snying ga sna rtse ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom bya/ /'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar/ /shes rab de ni rtag tu bsgom/ /gang phyir yid ni dgar gyur pas/ /de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o/ /gnas med gnas par legs sbyor bas/ /bzhi mtshungs gcig tu sbyor ba rig /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs/ /byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /

358
081-179b nyams dga' sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan/ /b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming / /rang gi de nyid gnyis med byung / /rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba ste/ /b+ha ga ling+ga yin par bsgrags/ /gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom pa'o/ /de las blo ldan gyis spro ba/ /ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas/ /mnyam pa med pas khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o/ /chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang / /rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyar/ / b+ha ga'i ling+gar brtag pa'o/ /de nas ba spu'i bu ga las/ /'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin/ /rdo rje rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba/ /stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling+ga zhes bshad do/ /de nas ba spu'i bu gnas/ /rdo rje sprin rnams kun du spro/ /rdo rje byang chub sems bsgom nyid/ /myur du dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros na/ /rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /khro bo rjes dran sbyor ba la'ang / /stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i/ /khro bo'i ba spu'i bu gnas/ /khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /khyab bdag rnam snang mdzad chen la/ /rjes dran sbyor ba'i dgongs pa ni/ /thub pa che la slar zhus pa/ /thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa/ /b+ha ga'i ling+ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las/ /sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa/ /tshul 'di ma 'ongs skye bo la/ /phyi dus kun rmongs bskyed pa sto/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bdag pos ni/ /ci phyir gsungs zhes de rnams smra/ /'gro bas nam mkha' mtshan ma can/ /rten 'byung khyod nyid mi shes shing / /de rnams shin tu rmongs dbye bas/ /ji bzhin par ni rtog par byed/ /mgon khyod

359
