081-180a bde ba chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston gcig pu/ /sku med srid gsum bdag nyid can/ /dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan/ /de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi/ /yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum/ /dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'byung / /khyod 'dir b+ha ga khyab 'jug ste/ /ling+ga drag po'i ming can nyid/ /khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtag /khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung / /dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che/ /dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid/ /shes dang shes bya rnam par grol/ /de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i bla/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /dam tshig rjes su dran bsgom pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad/ /rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las/ /rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid/ /dbang po gnyis nyid sbyor ba las/ /rang gi tshangs pa rtag drangs te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga/ /sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig /gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga/ /rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs/ /de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin/ /thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni/ /kun du bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sems can rjes dran sbyor ba gang / /sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid/ /spyod pa mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa/ /de sbyor dran pa bsgom pa ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin/ /gsung dang sku ni rnam sgom pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid/ /rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi/ /sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba/ /bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig

360
081-180b rjes dran rnams kyis ni/ /de bas tshangs pa shin tu dbyung / /dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung / /de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni/ /dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na/ /dngos grub sngags mchog 'thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur ba/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do/ /pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa/ /yod med gnyis dang bral ba'o/ /thams cad rang bzhin dri ma med/ /ma skyes pa dang zad pa med/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o/ /ma skyes rjes su sbyor ba gang / /der ni ci yang brjod min zhing / /ma skyes ming ni gcig pu pa/ /dran pa de ni yin par bshad/ /ji ltar nam mkha' 'od gsal ba/ /mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med/ /rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing / /gnyis med gnyis su yod min zhing / /yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang / /zhe sdang rdzogs longs spyod pa'i ming / /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing / /de ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya/ /rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te/ /bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /brtan pa'i sems ni thob pa las/ /rang gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /dngos med bdag nyid dag pa gang / /de ni dag par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid kyis ni mchod par bsngags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro/ /'di yis lus la mchod pa dang / /khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs/ /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag grub/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa/ /de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid/ /de bzhin so sor rab tu brtag /mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang / /gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal/ / dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /de ni ci dgar spyod par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste/ /sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa/ /le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// //

361
081-181a de nas dpal ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag /mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa la/ /bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab/ /nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che/ /theg pa chen po rnam snang ba/ /kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang / /dngos kun dngos po gcig pa'i mchog /rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung / /rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che/ /gti mug chen po blo gros che/ /theg pa gsum po rab ston cing / /rdo rje theg pa ston pa po/ /nam mkha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog /ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che/ /rdo rje gsum po chags med pa/ /rgyal gnas mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog /thar lam gcig pu ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag /mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /dngos po kun gcig shin tu dag /byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba/ /rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad/ /bdag med chos ni shin tu dag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po/ /kun don rin chen mchog 'dzin pa/ /na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni/ /gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag /rnam par dben nam gtsang ba yi/ /sa phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i gnas yid 'ong / /bshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o/ /rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi/ /phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes/ /rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams/ /rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste/ /len pa mi gsal la sbyor la/ /de nyid

362
081-181b na chung yin par brtag /'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa/ /gang zhig dngos med ces bshad pa/ /mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin/ /gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin te/ /rnam par dben pa dngos med pa/ /sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin/ /sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin/ /zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs/ /bshang gci yul dang dbang por grags/ /chu ni shes rab la sogs drug /'di dag gis gang byugs gyur ba/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod 'byung ba/ /de rtag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa/ /dgongs pa sbyor ba chos nyid do/ /mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi/ /bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad/ /'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi bo/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying ga ru/ /rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang / /rked ba gsang ba 'jig rten pa/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni/ /rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par bsgom/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar bsgom/ /chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni/ /mA ma kI ra ni yongs su brtag /zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas/ /bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya/ /rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa/ /gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba/ /blo ldan ba spu'i bu ga las/ /ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya/ /gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod/ / rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma/ /me yi sbyor ba bshad ba ni/ /de yang mi gsal zhi la gnas/ /sgrol mar ut+pal nyid gyur pa/ /rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o/ /'jug dang gnas dang skye ba dang / /de bzhin ldang ba'i ming can no/ /de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ / de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba/ /lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las/ /me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus/ /me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang / /chu ru yongs su brtags pa yin/ /re re'ang dang

363
081-182a po sbyor zhes bya/ /me tog de lnga gsum du bshad/ /bya rgod me tog za ba dang / /bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing / /me tog 'di yi dgongs pa ni/ /ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes so/ /ma rtogs pas ni de rnams kyi/ /dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur/ /'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes/ /smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid smod/ /de ltar bdag nyid smad pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas/ /mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min/ /phyi rol na min gnyis gar min/ /tshogs pa las kyang ma yin te/ /rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag la gnas/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas/ /lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las/ /gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus/ /des ni bdag dang de dag smod/ /de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /dgongs pa de ni bshad du gsol/ / rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na/ /mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /me tog don ni bshad par bya/ /pad+ma ut+pal nyin mor bshad/ /dzA ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad/ / lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig /gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du 'gyur/ /de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad/ /mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis/ /mjug tu 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang / /dgongs pas yongs su brtags pa yin/ /de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur/ /de bas lha tshogs kyis de min/ /rnal 'byor pa dang sngags pa rnams/ /dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson bya/ /dgongs pa byin rlabs rgyu yis ni/ /de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa/ /de ni pad+ma ut+pal ming / /de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum/ /dzA ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod/ /kar+Ni ka dang ma li ka/ /yuka ti ka ra bI ra ni/ /go rims bzhin du spyan sogs te/ /sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro/ /dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas/ /lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas/ /gcig tu

364
081-182b sangs rgyas kun mnyes pa'i/ /mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro/ /lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag /lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur bya/ /de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni/ /dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /der ni mkhas pas rtag par ni/ /rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya/ /pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /de bzhin ut+pal rtag tu bsgom/ /dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa/ /dpag tshad brgya khyon de nyid gsum/ /byams pa la sogs gru bzhir gyur/ /mdzes pa phung pos brgyan pa yin/ /gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur/ /zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can/ /mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni/ /shes rab can gyis gnas bsgom mo/ /mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams/ /de yi mchod pa rgya mtsho gsal/ /rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid/ /gos ni bsdu pa zhes bya'o/ /mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis/ /byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya/ /shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las/ /lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /sbyor gcig de las yang dag byung / /rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin/ /dga' mgu yang dag ldan pa yi/ /dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ / nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya/ /rin chen thams cad dbul bar bya/ /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung / /rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni/ /des bkang pa yi zhing 'di ni/ /shes rab thabs cig las byung ba'i/ /dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir/ /zhing de nyin re dbul bar ni/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de/ /phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam bzhag ste/ /'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la/ /reg par yang dag sbyor ba dbul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ / bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgom/ /bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /yul dang dbang po sun 'byin pa/ /dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung / /yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i/ /bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar/ /de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ /skal bzang zhing ni

365
081-183a mdzes pa yi/ /bud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang / /gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'byung bas/ /rnal 'byor ma de byin brlabs la/ /byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu/ /rang gi lus kyi nang du gzhug /spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas bkod de/ /mig bzang dag ba'i bya ba yi/ /rang byung khu ba blangs nas mchod/ /gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de/ /blangs pas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang / /spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa/ /de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang / /de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/ /rdo rje ye shes can gsang gi/ /gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ /gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa/ /de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsung gi gsang ba las/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /le'u brgyad pa yin par bshad// //de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog /gzugs don dbang phyug dam pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o/ /gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rdo rje yang / /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang / /'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag byung / /bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag / rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni/ /rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i/ /thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan/ /bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu/ /rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /sems can thams cad bsad na ni/ /

366
081-183b de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /zhe sdang rigs chen de nyid kyis/ /zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur/ /de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu/ /gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig /dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi/ /mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ / 'di ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis/ /mgon khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /chos sku gcig pu las 'khrungs pa/ /ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlag /de ni phyer brlags gyur pa las/ /ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub 'gyur/ /chos sku gcig pu las byung las/ /lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus/ /phyer brlag byed pas dngos med pas/ / phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du/ /sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa/ /nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la/ /de 'dra bar ni phyer brlag par/ /sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so/ /sems can gyis ni sems can bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas/ /'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes/ /ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa/ /min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing / /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bzhin/ /rab tu spang bar byed par 'gyur/ /theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba/ /dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog /de ni bcom ldan myur sbyor bas/ /mi bskyod zhing du skye 'gyur ram/ /sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa/ /de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am/ /snying rjes gsad par bya'o zhes/ /sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong / /'das tshe ston par gyur pa dang / /da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang / /mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o/ /mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis/ /de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi/ /de nyid sna tshogs don ldan tshig /de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtogs/ /gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams/ /dgongs pa'i don la rtog med

367
081-184a 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni/ /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i/ /'gro la phan pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang / /khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa/ /legs so bu khyod cher legs te/ /kun du bzang po khyod legs so/ /dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni/ /khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa/ /gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yi bshad par bya/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang / /dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brtan/ /'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te/ /de sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /mi gsal rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid/ /des bshig pa ni bsad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du/ /sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi/ /kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur pa/ / 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rdo rje'i spyod pa nyid/ /lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni/ /de tshe myur la sogs bya ba/ /klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid/ /phung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /de yi yan lag phung por bshad/ /de ni phyer gyur bsad pa yin/ /'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong / /mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid/ /de bzhin skye ba dam pa yin/ /dngos grub chen po des thob 'gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan bde chen po/ /ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa/ /rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa rab bsgrubs pas/ /phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gtso bo la/ /bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing / / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya/ /shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur/ /rnam smin dngos po med pa yi/ /de nyid 'phrog pa'i rdo rje

368
081-184b dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje mchog sbyor ba/ /rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang / /nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid/ /dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags/ /rigs kun rgya mtsho shes bya ste/ /de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa/ /gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /bud med lta bur sbyor ba yang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de ru bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin/ /dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyor/ /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba/ /gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor ba'i/ /snyoms zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni/ /de dag thams cad nye bar spyod/ /sku gsum mi phyed sngags rnams kyi/ /'di ni bsgom pa mchog de yin/ /de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di/ /'dod chags rig gcig bsgom pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste/ /sngags pa rnams kyis nyin re zhing / /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum/ /rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa po/ /bdag med ye shes las byung bas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba/ /rgyal ba thams cad slu ba ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o/ /gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa/ /brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste/ /dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de ni rgyal ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i ye she dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub byed

369
081-185a pa'i mchog /dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i/ /rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o/ /kun du kun nas 'bad pa yi/ /ji bzhin don du 'dra byas te/ /so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni dngos grub rgya chen thob/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag /rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i/ /dam tshig de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi sa 'di gang / /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du/ /rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni/ /sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan thub pas de skad gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che/ /bsam pas dpal ldan gcig pu nyid/ /dpag tu med par gyur pa yin/ /de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs/ /chos dbyings rdo rje gsum nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni/ /tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di/ /de ni de rnams rjod par byed/ /ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing / /'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam/ /gtso bos yang dag rdo rje'i tshig /dgongs pas ci slad gang gsungs zhes/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / / brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang / /brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyis ni/ /ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'

370
081-185b sems chen la/ /dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs/ /dman dang smad pa'i 'du shes ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig /ci phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs/ /'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin/ /'di ltar sngags kyi spyod mchog 'di/ /rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu/ / sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di/ /gsang ba'i sngags don spyod pa nyid/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /nam mkha' kun bu song ba ste/ /chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing / /rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing / /de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas/ /de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min/ /'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas/ /rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang / /de ltar don gyi dbang mkhyen nas/ /dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis/ /chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin/ / de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis/ /mdor na khong du chud par bya/ /yang dag byang chub don rnams kyis/ /nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor byung ba'i/ /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu/ /gtsub shing gtsub stan bcas pa dang / / skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi/ /rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi/ /gtsub shing la sogs re re nas/ /'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ /me de gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /brag ca dang ni gzugs brnyan dang / /sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang / /de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste/ /chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra/ /mgon po pi bang sgra lta bu/ /rkyen don las tshig yang dag byung / /de bzhin 'gro 'ong gnas pa rnams/ /cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin/ /des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi/ /dam tshig rjes su rig par bya/ /de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas/ /rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir/ /phung po de bzhin gshegs par shes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas

371
081-186a ni/ /dam pa yis ni mig gdangs te/ /tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos 'di ngo mtshar rmad byung ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi/ /mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang / /kun rdzob tu ni bshad par mdzad/ /dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas/ /dgongs pa lung ston mchog la ni/ /gang zhig yid 'ong bzod gyur pa/ /de ni de bzhin spyod pa yin/ /mchog du dag pa'i de nyid don/ /gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba/ /dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad/ /le'u dgu pa rdzogs pa yin// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /slar yang dgongs pa 'dus nas ni/ /bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas/ /mngon par byang chub ded dpon nyid/ /sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtso la/ /btud de de bzhin gshegs pas gsol/ /snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum/ /dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye shes/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol/ /gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog /yang dag bsdus don de bzhin gshegs/ / de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/ /'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum/ /sku dang gsung thugs bsgom pa ni/ /mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa/ /dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi/ /rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la/ /dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te/ /de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na/ /mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang / /rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong du ma zhes bya dang / /sems can don bya la rol dang / /mchog ni de rnams ston par mdzad/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig

372
081-186b rten khams mchog tu/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas/ /rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang / /yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni/ /sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams la/ /kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rang gtso gsang sngags spyod tshul mchog /chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di dag rdzogs par gyur snyam nas/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho mi mdzad/ /de ltar rnam par dpyad pa'i don/ /gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la/ /yang dag par ni byin brlabs phyir/ /de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs de rnams/ /so so skye bor gyur pa la/ /dngos po med cing dmigs su med/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas/ /ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad/ /de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /sems can don gyi bya ba kun/ /'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin/ /mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams/ /sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung / /thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin par mnyam bzhag nyid/ /de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang / /'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad/ /'di rnams kyis ni mgon po 'di/ /mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams/ /rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang / /'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur cing / /'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams/ /de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa/ /dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di/ /de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni/ /nges par ldan pa nges par 'dod/ /yod med la sogs byed pa ni/ /gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa/ /gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga/ /khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang / /gzugs sogs zhes bya'i ming can yin/ /'di ni yan lag thams cad ni/ /bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o/ /

373
081-187a de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste/ /tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di/ /gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas/ /de bzhin ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po/ /chos sku ngo bo la sogs pa/ /mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa/ / gnas med gnas par sbyor ba yis/ /'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa/ /zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon/ /'khor ba dang ni cig shos spangs/ /sngags las yang dag 'byung ba de/ /mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams/ /dngos med gnas la gnas pas na/ /sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni rdzogs longs spyod gzigs 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di/ /don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas/ /rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las/ /chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi shes pas/ /phyi dus skye bo la la smra/ /'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir/ /gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje grags pa che/ /dgongs pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa/ /bu khyod shes rab chen po legs/ /gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i/ /skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur/ /tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don/ /yang dag bsdus nas khyod kyis bshad/ /de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig /skyes bu dam pa de dag la/ /spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas/ /snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang gcig pu/ /mchog las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang / /chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsung thugs/ /dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no/ /nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las/ /tshig la nges par brjod pa ni/ /de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus/ /

374
081-187b sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu/ /yi ge hU~M ni gcig gsungs la/ /de nas yi ge oM gsungs te/ /de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH/ /swA ni de bzhin bzhi pa yin/ /hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste/ /de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga/ /hU~M oM AHswA de bzhin hA/ /'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur/ /de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /zhi ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de yang / /de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis/ /de yi byin brlab sbyor don du/ /dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba/ /re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang / / bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do/ /zla ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hU~M/ /rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag /rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas/ /dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der/ / rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso/ /'di ni kun mchog chen por skye/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba/ /sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o/ /snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags/ /rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do/ /rang sngags tshul las byung ba'o/ /skyes bu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi po sbyor gcig pus/ /gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do/ /kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lta'i/ /de nyid gsum gcig rnam bsgom zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni/ /rdo rje dam tshig gtso bos gsungs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog /zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che/ /gtso la phyag na rdo rje yis/ /gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa/ /hU~M oM AHdang swA hA~M zhes/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa/ /thub chen

375
081-188a de 'dir ji lta bur/ /mgon po de ni phyi dus na/ /ji skad gsungs pa mi rtog pa/ /gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal gyur ces/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/ /lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi/ /grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing / /ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang / /'dar zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur/ /ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba/ /mi mkhas pa yi nga rgyal can/ /bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su/ /rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed/ /de ni sngags don gsungs pa yi/ /mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes par/ /sngags don de nyid mkhas pa yi/ /gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs/ /'khrul pa cung zad tsam mthong na/ /bzhad gad dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi/ /mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i/ /'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams/ /'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang / /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /skad cig rjes gsung grub don du/ /sbyor bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can/ /bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro phan phyag na rdo rje la/ /de ltar sbyor ba yang dag sbyor/ /bsgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa/ /dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid/ /gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur/ /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i/ / lus las skyes te yod pa 'di/ /stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas 'gyur 'dod/ /sngags de sngags pa sangs rgyas de/ /bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor/ /zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /zhi ba'i bde ba de nas brtsam/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing / /rang bzhin dri ma med byas la/ /dal dang myur dang gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs de gcig dag la bzhugs/ /yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang / /sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas/ /de nas dbang po med gyur pa/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /

376
081-188b de yi chos ni lta ba po/ /de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung / /gang phyir dang ni zlo gyur pa/ /yi ge hU~M gi gsang sngags lnga/ /de tshe snying las rab 'dar zhing / /dbang po thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni/ / sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar/ /nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni/ /phung po la sogs bshad pa gang / /sangs rgyas sras bcas par gyur te/ /des ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te/ /de sngags bdag nyid dngos las byung / /de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba/ /phra mo'i snying gang dbus gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o/ /de yi dbus gnas zhi ba yi/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya/ /de hU~M zhes bya'i 'od po che/ /de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/ /'di ni mchog gyur rtse lnga pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtag tu bsgom/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya/ /de yi snying gar bsdams nas ni/ /lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang / /rol mo 'di ni dam pa ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas/ /snying ga ru ni bskul bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di/ /zhag bdun bar du byas nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /rdo rje gsum po yang dag bsgrub/ /phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang / /de ni dngos po med lta ba/ /de nyid mchog gi gsang sngags kyis/ /skrag pa rnam smin mthong ba la/ /skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste/ /gsang sngags gnyis med sbyor gcig byung / /mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing / /'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin/ /zhi ba gcig bu'i sbyor ba las/ /sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i/ /dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur/ /

377
081-189a phung po la brtags sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don bsgrub pas/ /rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig las/ /'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog /de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o/ /de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po/ /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs/ /de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor pa'i/ /gcig par bsgom pa rtag tu byed/ /bdag dmigs sems can yod min pa'i/ /sngags kyi dbang po rnam bsgom pa/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste/ /dngos po thams cad rnam brtags pa'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi dam tshig mchog bsgom pa'o/ / rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor/ /rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang bsgom/ /gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/ /lta ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba/ /de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni/ / mi phyed rdo rje gsum grub pa/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis/ /phung po bdag nyid mi dmigs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim/ /bud med de ni rgya chen 'gyur/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba/ /gsang sngags de nyid don gsang nyid/ /de ni gsang bas nye bar spyod/ /der ni yid 'ong sangs rgyas rnams/ /bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/ /sngags rig dam pa spro 'o zhes/ /der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig ni/ /ston pa 'dir ni bla ma cher/ / 'jig rten pa la 'dir bshad de/ /'jig rten 'das pa zlog pa'o/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni/ /'di yis shin tu thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog des 'thob/ /dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la/ /gang zhig sems

378
081-189b ni dad gyur pa/ /gsang ba 'bad de yang dag bsrung / /de ni rtag tu legs par byed/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yang / /de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba/ /le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// //de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsol pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig /nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yi/ /sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i/ /le'u 'di ni bka' stsal to/ /sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsgom/ /rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang / /tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad/ /ye shes snying po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa/ /sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o/ /a dang zung ni gsung rdo rje/ /byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o/ /hU~M ni rdo rje gsum mtha' nyid/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o/ /de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang / /ldang pa dag tu rab tu bshad/ /nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi/ /skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro/ /de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de/ /rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du 'gyur/ /brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las/ /de ni nam mkha' las brgyar 'gyur/ /brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la/ /de las nges par nyi shu lnga/ /skyes bu nyid du byung ba na/ /mgrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang / /sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa gcig nyid gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste/ /'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad/ /'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu/ /de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid/ /de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung / /longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o/ /de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las/ /'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur/ /mtshams dang skye mched nor lha'o/ /zla ba zung gcig rig byed de/ /de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams/ /de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas/ /'di rnams las gcig bzung nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di/ /nam

379
081-190a mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa/ /yi ge hU~M ni des bsam mo/ /rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku/ /de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor par/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gtsug tor ni/ /sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba pa/ /gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur/ /sngags spyod don ni sgrub pa po/ /chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog /rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug tor/ /lus dang rnam par rgyal de bzhin/ /bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad/ /sbyor dang bya ba gnyis med bzhin/ /sbyor ba 'ba' zhig nyid la 'di/ /b+hU~M ni gtsug tor yin par bstan/ /ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di/ /dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam nyid ldan/ /sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /o~M zhes bya ba de ru bsgom/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge AHni rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang / /yi ge hU~M ni de ru bsgom/ /yi ge bru~M ni gnas ming can/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal to/ /snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog /sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'/ /o~M AHhU~M gi grangs dang mnyam/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam/ /thugs kyi ye shes 'jings su bya/ /rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni/ / re re zhing ni yang dag bshad/ /sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang / /rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin/ /byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o/ /sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin/ /rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed pa/ /rdzogs pa la sogs bsgom pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni/ /gsum po ye shes rdo rje stsol/ /byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin/ /rnam

380
081-190b par dben dang ci rigs pa'i/ /stan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi/ /rig pa'i skyes bur yang dag sbyor/ /brtul zhugs can gyis kun du brtsam/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla phyed/ /thun gcig tu ni rab tu brtag /de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis/ /rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log /rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub/ /grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus/ /bskyed pa yi ge o~M bsgom bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi gtan tshigs gang / /snying por yongs su brtags pa yin/ /sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid/ /spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas/ /gcig dang gsum gyi dngos por 'gyur/ /dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba/ /phyed pos gsum gyi ming can ni/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum/ / sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul zhugs can/ /mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan/ /'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po/ /rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas/ /rdo rje rnam snang de las ni/ /dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba/ /skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa/ /ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /ye shes 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum/ /de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa/ /grangs med ces bya de nyid do/ /sku yi gsang ba de nyid 'di/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs/ /zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba/ /rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de/ /sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yi/ /ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to/ /a dang u ni lkog ma'i dbus/ /rkan gyi steng gi ming can no/ /i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid/ /u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag /ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod/ /li ti rkang pa cig shos la/ /dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa/ /ha ni lus skyes

381
081-191a gtsug tor dang / /gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can/ /yon tan bzhi yi bzhi po de/ /lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor/ /de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa chen po de nyid 'di/ /cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags/ /dus can bdag nyid sbyor dbang po/ /de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig /a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa/ /rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni/ /AHni ngag gi lam du bzhag /kha dog lnga yi kun nas ni/ /brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag /'jig rten dbang phyug mchog bsgoms pas/ /dam tshig ye shes bsgom par bya/ /gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad/ /khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste/ /thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya/ / chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas/ /gsung gi gsang ba 'di nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ /dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /de ni rang sngags skyes bu dag /hU~M ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid can/ /kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/ /yang dag ye shes yon tan mtsho/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas/ /lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu/ /spyi bo sa yi ming can te/ /rdo rje gsum thugs gsang ba gcig /de ni ha~M la zhugs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung / /ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni/ /lus kun la ni kha~M dmigs na/ /rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /dngos

382
081-191b po med don gsal byed pa/ /kha~M nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad/ /rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las/ /kha~M du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas/ /gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba/ /so so ru ni yang dag gnas/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che/ /chos rnams des ni mi gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas kun ni gnyis med dang / /mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin/ /dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung / /mi snang rdo rje gsum 'di yin/ /de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs/ /ma 'dres pa yi chos bdag nyid/ /sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /rang sngags skyes bur bsam par bya/ /ha~M ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa/ /snying ga ru ni yang mdzes pa/ /rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni/ /'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni/ /'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can/ /sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni/ /dgongs don de tshe kun du byung / /ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/ /snang ba can zhes bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /th+l+h-IM ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba/ /mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor/ /dam tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i/ /th+l+h-IM ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad/ /sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa/ /dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad/ /mngon shes lnga dang 'dra ba 'di/ /de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa/ /'di ni dam pa yin par bshad/ /de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i mchog /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la/ /yi ge o~M ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi

383
081-192a gsang ba 'di/ /yi ge oM ni mi zad gtso/ /'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis/ /bsgoms pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig mchog /de sku byang chub rdo rje can/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/ /de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ /mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni/ /gsung thugs rtse gcig 'dzin pa las/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje can gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa bsam/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ / rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing / /dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi/ /bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing / /sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis/ /ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dpag med las byung pa/ /rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur/ /longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba/ /rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung / /de nyid gsum gsang dgongs pa las/ /rin chen rdo rje de gnas 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la/ /der ni chos kyi o~M bsgom mo/ /chos kyi o~M ni de tshe yang / /rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni/ /bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog / 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan/ /'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /don yod pa yi dam tshig mchog /sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa/ /'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i/ /ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad/ /sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i/ /longs spyod kun du 'gyur ba yi/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad/ /'od zer der ni rab tu bsgom/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM/ /'od chen der ni rab tu bsgom/ /de nas 'di ni rdo

384
081-192b rje gsum/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad/ /rnam snang rdo rje can de yin/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub/ /de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /tsheg gcig la ni sna tshogs don/ /sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog la/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni/ /gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /thub pa che la slar yang zhus/ /o~M AHhU~M ni gsum la sogs/ /b+h+rU~M sogs thog mar gnas pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi skyes bur de 'gyur ro/ /o~M ni rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur/ /AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso/ /hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpar bshad/ /skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /b+h+rU~M ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /kha~M ni nges par mi snang ba/ /ha~M ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad/ /k+Sha~M ni rdo rje bkod ces bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub stsol/ /de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /o~M la sogs pa A las skyes/ /o~M AHhU~M ni de nyid gsum/ /rnam snang rdo rje can gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags/ /shin tu rnam par nges par bshad/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor pa/ /lnga pa bco lngar yang dag bshad/ /khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba/ /gsang sngags skyes bu zhes bya ba/ /gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang / /ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin/ /sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te/ /de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni/ /dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung / /dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming / /de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/ /mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi/ /pi wang sgra ni mchis ma lags/ /de bzhin phyag rgya med par ni/ /gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo / /brda gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di/ /gang gi don du rab gsungs pa/ /

385
081-193a lag pa'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub pa'i/ /phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni/ /phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang / /gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces/ /khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad/ /'di ni sngags sbyor gcig pu las/ / phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na/ /gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar bsgrub/ /sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur dang / /lha rnams kyi yang sbyor las byung / /'gro ba'i don ni rab bsgrub pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang / /yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das/ /mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /ji ltar 'gro la de phan 'gyur/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod/ /gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub/ /lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu/ /'di dag ma 'ongs skye bo yis/ /gang zhig shes na yang dag par/ /nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba/ /mi yi skyes bu 'di dag gsungs/ /de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i nges pa 'jig rten pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje la gsungs so/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs lcags zhes bya/ /nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las/ /gsang sngags skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni mi mchog ngag tu 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis/ /lcags ni gser du byed pa yin/ /de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis/ / mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin/ /nges byas sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus/ /sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin/ /dngos med pa las yang dag skyes/ /sngags kyi skyes bu 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis/ /myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol/ /gnas pa yis ni de bsgrub pa'o/ /yid rton dngos grub dam pa yin/ /de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya che dang gcig bsgrub las/ /myur ba la sogs

386
081-193b gsum ldan pa/ /de ni phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /'bad de bla mas slob ma yi/ /rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya/ /myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang / /gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur/ /sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs/ /ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar/ /phung po la sogs chos rnams kun/ /stong zhing rten 'brel las byung ba/ /mthong zhing de bzhin sbyor ba las/ /chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur/ /'dir ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med/ /phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin/ /de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byed/ /'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig /sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa'i mi/ /spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol/ /de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o/ /nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba/ /ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor/ /de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang / /gnyi ga la ni yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad/ /sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni/ /'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag /rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor/ /rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa/ /sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang / /brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug /gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /de rnams gnas pa'i sbyor ba nyid/ /dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /gzhan yang gsang ba po yi mchog / sems kyi rgyan ni nyid ltos dang / /dngos med byang chub 'thob pa la/ /gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med/ /'jig rten na ni rtog ci snyed/ /dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba/ /de ni dngos med sems gcig las/ /rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig rtogs/ /byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la/ /de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gnyi ga las min gzhan las min/ /mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis sngags/ /gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te/ /de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang / /rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o/ /

387
081-194a sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/ /sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par dben par rab tu brtag /gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan/ /klung dang 'bab chu la sogs yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba/ /dur khrod la sogs pa yi ming / /'di ni sngags rig mchog rnams kyi/ /bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'dir/ /'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o/ /mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam/ /mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ / sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom/ /rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che/ /dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje chen po rab mdzes pa/ /rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'khor/ /rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ /mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin/ /mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la/ /gnas nas bla na med pa brtag /gtso bo me stag mang po 'khrug /rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje la ni rab dgod pas/ /rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na/ / sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lus la rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /snying gar yi ge o~M bsams na/ /sngags la mngon shes bsgom par 'gyur/ /'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems/ /nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi/ /dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /der ni mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ /hU~M ni snying ga'i zla gnas par/ /bsams la sems ni de ru bzhag /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor/ /AHni snying ga'i thig ler gnas/ /bsams la rdo rje'i yang dag bzhag /'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog /rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor skyes/ /'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung

388
081-194b ba'o/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge o~M/ /bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH/ /bsams na bskal pa dag tu gnas/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /lus dang ngag sems yi ge hU~M/ /bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ /bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum/ /dam tshig rtogs pas de skad gsungs/ / dgu mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di/ /sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /brjod du med cing ming med la/ /shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang / /kun rdzob la ni legs gnas nas/ /tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do/ /rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can/ /rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cad ni/ /gang zhig klog gam sems kyang rung / /rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur/ /ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan/ /khyad par du yang byin gyis rlob/ /klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni/ /bris nas gang du 'jog gyur pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur/ /khams gsum thams cad bcom nas ni/ /myur bar de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing / /'khor los sgyur ba'i bu bzhin du/ /byang chub myur du des 'thob bo/ /khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis/ /de ni dngos po med par 'joms/ /dngos med gcig tu rdzogs longs spyod/ /phung sogs yan lag don las byung / /bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni/ /sngags pa sngags las gyur pa yin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rang mtshan nyid/ /skad cig kyang ni 'dor mi bya/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /rigs las skyes pa byin gyis rlob/ /dgongs la lung ston la gnas nas/ /gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag bsrung / /mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /

389
081-195a spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang / /gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung / /de ni rig pa skyes bu mchog /bcu gcig par ni yang dag bshad/ /ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung / /'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur gyur/ /de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /bskyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso/ /de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal to/ /mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can/ / dngos med shin tu dri med la/ /dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni/ /gar dang glu dang rol mo dang / /dgod dang sgeg pas rab mdzes pas/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyis/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can ni/ /ji lta ji ltar ston pa bzhin/ /gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni/ /myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pa/ /de yi ming ni yid ldan pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gnas/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang / / thos shing rig par gyur pa ni/ /de ni u dum wA ra yi/ /me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo 'di/ /gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de/ /chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus/ /mgon po de nyid bsdus pa las/ /rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang / /'jig rten pa de gar byed pa/ /gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni/ /chos dbyings de ni gar min na/ /gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin/ /chos dbyings de ni glu min na/ /gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de ni rol mo min/ /

390
081-195b gtso bo ji ltar rol mor 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgyang phan rmongs rol mo/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /chos dbyings de rgod ma lags na/ /gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan rgod/ /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ / chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na/ /gtso bo ji ltar sgeg par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan sgeg /gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po la/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing / /bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis/ / rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin snyam/ /rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di/ /yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid/ /de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor bdag /yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog /de nas de nyid yang dag gzung / /rnal 'byor rigs mchog rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas/ /nor can ming ni nyams la sogs/ /gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos bshad pa'i/ /gar gyis skye dgu dga' bar byed/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub/ /sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams/ /sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa/ /de rnams lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /mgon po shes rab 'di srid du/ /thabs kyis mchil par nye bar sbyor/ /sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin/ /bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa/ /dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni/ /gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa/ /ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o/ /phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni/ /de nyid du ni tshol mod kyi/ /'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can/ /der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing / /sred pa yis ni sten par byed/ /bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni/ /gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed/ /khyod bka' las 'das dman pa rnams/ /sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa/ /'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur

391
081-196a zhing / /de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin/ /sred pa'am dad pa dag gis kyang / /rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams/ /gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin/ /rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /mgon po de ni der gnas shing / /nyams shing blo gros dman par gnas/ /de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung / /tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las/ /chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang / /phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur par/ /bdag nyid che de byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang / /sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba/ /gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa/ /gsang sngags la sogs chos rnams la/ /dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed/ /log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni/ /byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur/ /a yi dog pa'i ras 'di ni/ /sbyor bshes rnams kyi 'di ma yin/ /de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa/ /gtam dag kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /sgyu ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na/ /rgyal po rnams ni slu bar byed/ /steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni/ /brgyad gnyis pa yi tshul du byed/ /de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag /ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni/ /AHyi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i/ /yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i mchog /dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na/ /de ni longs spyod lam skyed min/ /de bas skye bo med gcig pu/ /bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug /der ni mche ba can ming 'gro/ /de la btsal ba 'ba' zhig yin/ /rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras/ /bar chad shin tu mang po pa/ /bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /des ni tshig de thos pa dang / /rgyal po'i bar du yid dga' zhing / /dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las/ /su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed/ /ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /'di la 'jigs pa'i sems 'or la/ /skye bo med par khyed kyis ni/ /

392
081-196b rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzangs sam/ /gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams/ /dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa/ /de dag thams cad brlag par bya/ /de nas rgyal po sbyin pa ni/ /rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o/ / 'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su/ /rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig /AHyi dog pa ras de byin/ /ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas/ /rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams/ /'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas su/ /de nas de ni mi snang ba/ /rgyun can gyis ni de tshe byas/ /de la sogs pa'i sna tshogs tshig /rigs skyes pa la de rnams smra/ /rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang / /skrag par byed cing the tshom med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po/ /'byin pa ston pa mnga' bdag gtso/ /phyag na rdo rje go byed pa/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje chen po legs/ /rdo rje thal mos ston par byed/ /rdo rje 'di ni zhus gyur pa/ /de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo de nyid 'di/ /lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig /de nyid gsum du gyur pa de/ /rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag /de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /de ru nga ni lha gsum 'gyur/ /oM AHhU~M dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni/ /sna tshogs lus can gcig ming can/ /zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston/ /der ni nga yang gnas pa yin/ / dpral yon de la bzhin mi sdug /de yi skyes bu ming ldan ming / /de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni/ /thim sogs ji bzhin grangs su bshad/ /lag pa g.yon ni drag por gyur/ /g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /gnyis pa sbyor bar tshangs pa yin/ /de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang / /rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste/ /rig byed der gyur gsum du bshad/ /srid srung zhi ba nga yin te/ /mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin/ /lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni/ /bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa/ /phyed po'i tsham gyi hU~M mchog ni/ /

393
081-197a rab tu zhi bar rab tu bsgrags/ /nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der/ /so sor yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur pa/ /shis pa zhi ba skyon med pa/ /yon tan o~M dang yi ge phyed/ /o~M zhes gsal bar brjod pa yin/ /sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan/ /gtsug mtha' dang ni lag pa gnas/ /nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las/ /ye shes me ni nges par skye/ /lce dang rkan gyi mtshan ma ni/ /sbyor las thar bar de bshad de/ /AH/ 'og tu AHdang yang dag ldan/ /de steng yi ge AHnyid de/ /thad ka ru ni ma bshad de/ /khyod ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid/ /yi ge o~M ni tshangs pa ste/ /AHni khyab 'jug yin par bshad/ /hU~M ni rlung du gyur pa yin/ /de nyid drag po zhes bya'o/ /zhi ba'i phyed phyed zhes bya ba/ /der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin/ /gnas dang 'pho dang skye ba dang / /gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'pho/ /ye shes rang nyid med yin te/ /khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no/ /ral gri la sogs dngos grub der/ /byang chub phyi rol nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi/ /rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag /tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams der/ / ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur/ /de ni mtho ris sogs 'gags pas/ /de bzhin 'gyur ba sel ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas/ /gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas/ /shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas/ /'jug 'gyur ba ni drag po yin/ /nam mkha' dgag pa'i sbyor ba yang / /tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can/ /mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste/ /de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba/ /spu yi cha ni stong las gcig /zhi de rnam par mi rtog nyid/ /thar pa gcig pur de ston bya/ /thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ /de lta bas na 'di log bya/ /zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o/ /ston pa de rnams phye nas ni/ /zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag /'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun/ /khyod kyi thal

394
081-197b mo dag la gnas/ /de rnams phyag rgya ston byed cing / /sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /'di nyid du ni nyi zla dang / /sbyin sreg las can me dang ni/ /lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang / /de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par gnas/ /zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la/ /de yang gcig dang du ma spangs/ /khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba/ /de bas de ni 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas/ /de ni spang bar mi bya zhing / /'di dag dngos med la ltos pas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod/ /gzhan du rnam rtog nyid las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur/ /de bas thal mo sbyar ba 'di/ /sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin/ /ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams/ /bsdu ba'i don du khyod kyis bya/ /smad bya 'on pa lkugs pa dang / / de bzhin long bar gyur pa dang / /gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir bya/ /de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa/ /de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas/ /de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyu can no/ /de ni nang min phyi ma yin/ /gnyis min gzhan gyi rgyu las min/ /phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min/ /'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na/ /ming ni rdo rje thal mor gyur/ /sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i/ /snying po rtogs par bya ba'i mchog /phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no/ /mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de/ /dngos grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi/ /mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas/ /gnyis por gcig 'gyur dge 'dun te/ /de 'di skyabs ni gsum yin te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin/ /phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi gnas mthong yin/ /thal mo bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur/ /

395
081-198a skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum/ /rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum/ /zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang / /lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang / /dus gsum dam tshig mchog gsum dang / /tshul gsum dkyil 'khor gsum du 'gyur/ /sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste/ /ji srid rtogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams/ /de ni thal mor sbyor 'di yin/ /'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog /rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag /ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid du ni der 'gyur na/ /gcig dang du ma rnam par spangs/ / chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa/ /'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud/ /'di ni mkhar ltar rang bzhin gcig /gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba/ /bsdu bar byas par gyur pas kyang / /sku gsum don gyi chos nyid do/ /'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste/ /dngos po med cing gnas med pa/ /mtha' med zad pa med par 'gyur/ /sku gsum dag ni rkyen las ni/ /rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te/ /de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur/ /hU~M gis sems can yang dag 'byin/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag /oM ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ / AHni gnas pa por 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga/ /gsal dang mi gsal sbyor ba ni/ /rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te/ /de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o/ /zlos dang bsam gtan rnam bral bar/ /de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster/ /rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te/ /'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do/ /rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te/ /byis rnams de la phyin ci log /rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum/ /dngos po med par de bshad do/ /de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni/ /yid min pa yi bzlas par gyur/ /yid rton gcig ni mdor bsdus las/ /rings dang ngal dang gnas pa rnams/ /zhi ba'i chos nyid la skye ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim/ /dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di/ /rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus de gyur/ /sprul pa bsam

396
081-198b mi khyab ces dben/ /sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa/ /de yang phul du gyur pa'i ming / /rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar/ /sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed/ /dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rjer sbyar/ /sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi chos rnams ston par byed/ /rnam pa dgu po thog mtha' can/ /sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin/ /gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas/ /sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste/ /gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang / /'jig rten rnams la gsol ba deng / /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de/ /khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur/ /de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so/ /sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do/ / mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin/ /de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa/ /chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so/ /rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di/ /khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung / /gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub des ni thob par gyur/ /AHnyid der ni mi gsal ba'i/ /rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin/ /dog par de ni yongs bshad de/ /dngos po med par ras kyi ming / /'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgom par bya/ /dog pa de yi ras don las/ /mi snang ba la sogs grub cing / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i don gcig yang dag byung / /AHyi dog ras mtshon pas ni/ /'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad/ /'di ni chos dang rdzogs longs spyod/ /sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur/ /byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir/ /de ni rnam pa lngar yang 'gyur/ /tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang / /rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yang shin tu ldan sems can/ /sems can sogs la rnam par gnas/ /rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang / /'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig /

397
081-199a skye ba med las skyes pas na/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o/ /shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni/ /'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod/ /de nas gsang sngags grub 'gyur ba/ /rnam par mi rtog cig shos nyid/ /ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te/ /sngags ni na ri bri bar bya/ /rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni/ /yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba/ /so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /i u dang ni ring por bcas/ /a ai au u ya ste mtha'/ /bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba mnyam bzhag bskyed pa yin/ /'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi/ /chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang / /rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur/ /cha bcas dbang gnas sngags pa ni/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / nA ga yi ni grangs bzhin du/ /skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa/ /nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang / /de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin/ /sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni/ /khams gsum dag ni lta bar 'dod/ /'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'am/ /mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las/ /yon tan gsum ni brda byas pa/ /yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming / /gzhon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming / /lta ba 'di ni bar skyes/ /de ni sgo glegs mtha' yin te/ /i u dang ni ring por bcas/ /yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan/ /tsheg drag mtha' yi ring sde can/ /yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang / /bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin/ /de nyid ring po ring ba'i mthas/ /bcu gnyis pa yi grangs su 'gyur/ /de nyid yi ge ur sbyor las/ /yi ge o~M zhes brjod pa yin/ /snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yin/ / ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste a las sngags pas ni/ /AHnyid du ni blta bar bya/ /de bzhin a yi sbyor ba las/ /yi ge a ni ci 'dod par/ /ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta/ /re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo/ /i r-i l-i u'i tshogs las kyang / /

398
081-199b sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs/ /lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni/ /rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa/ /gang tshe A ka'i sde grangs las/ /a yi kha yi rgyab na gnas/ /i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang / /tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no/ /dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang / /lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag /dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang / /rkang pa g.yas g.yon de bzhin no/ /gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas/ /ta tshan shin tu dngos grub ster/ /u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni/ /lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad/ / rkang pa yang ni ri ti'i tshan/ /'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i/ /sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong / /lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub pa/ /me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin/ /rang rgyud kyis ni nang nyid du/ /lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin/ /dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun/ /de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur/ /tsha ba'i gzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas/ /mkhas pa yis ni sgo rnams bya/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang / /dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro/ /'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang / /ma spel bar ni mthong ba yin/ /thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ /yi ge hA yis mchod par bya/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing / /'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos/ /yi ge a ni lus su bya/ /lhag ma rnam pa dang bcas pa/ /mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las/ /sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston/ /sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skye/ /dbang bskur gsum po spyi las skye/ /gzugs med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pa/ /'jig rten pa yi chos dgar 'gyur/ /a ku ha gnas byang phyogs gnas/ /yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das/ /gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/ /gsang sngags bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs/ /de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa/ /rang gi mtshan ma cig shos nyid/ /gzugs

399
081-200a med 'di la gnas yod pa/ /cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur/ /steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su/ /dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas/ /dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang / /'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po las/ / smon lam la sogs bsgom bya ba'o/ /'gro don gtogs 'dod pa yi yon tan gyur bdag la/ /dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod/ /sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni/ /thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol/ /nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam brgyan sku yi mchog /'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brten par mdzad/ /lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku/ /bdag ni yongs su bzung la chos rnams don yod mdzod/ /sring mos kyang ni khyad par du/ /de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni/ /de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de/ /rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad/ /shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs kyis ni/ /phan bas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur/ /bla ma bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na/ /dga' ba las byung chos dga' bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong dang gnas pa tsam 'di ni/ /nam yang ltos par gyur pa dag gi mnga' ba lags/ /kun du song ba'i bdag nyid can gyi dam tshig ston/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang khyed bdag 'dod pa mdzod/ /dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje yis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg de bzhin khrus/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags pa mdzad/ /'dod pa med cing chags la zhi/ /de yang don dam dag gyur yin/ /spyod dus de bzhin sngags pa ni/ /bzlas brjod dngos po med pa yin/ /bsnyengs pa yang ni yid bzang ldan/ /mda' dang rig byed yon tan dang / /zung dang zla dkyil rnal 'byor pa/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gzhag par bya/ /ha yi sde tshan ka sde dang / /bcu gnyis phyed phyed dag tu sbyar/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs

400
081-200b 'di ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod/ /de nas sngags pa mdun 'dug ste/ /dgongs pa'i don gyis brtag par bya/ /phung po khams la sogs blta ba/ /brda las ji ltar lus yin bzhin/ /ma byin len pa byang chub sems/ /kun rdzob bstan pa rdzun smra ba/ /phung po srog chags gyur pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bud med yin/ /mi sbyin tshig dang rkang pa ste/ /de bzhin rten pa nyid kyang ni/ /dus gsum sbyor ba gcig pu ru/ /sngags pa yis ni de bya'o/ /bshang ba zhes ni yul la bshad/ /gci ba zhes ni dbang po yin/ /de dag za bar bshad pa ni/ /ma skyes gcig pur mthong ba'o/ /khrag gi pags par yang dag bshad/ /sa bon lus zhes bya ba yin/ /rkang ni sems kyi kun rtog pa/ /za ba dngos med gyur pa'o/ /smon lam dbang gis 'di rnams ni/ / bi mu ra shu pa sa 'di/ /lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la/ /byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog /rdo rje theg la gnas khyod kyang / /chos nyid de yang mi shes so/ /rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas/ / chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs/ /de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa/ /mthon po'i gsang gis rtog par byed/ /yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig /'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa/ /'gro don gcig pa'i sbyor ba las/ /de nyid kyi ni de nyid mthong / /gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi/ /sems ni dngos grub la gzhol ba/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las/ /dngos po med pa nyid du byung / /bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs/ /kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por 'byung / /sprul pa'i lus las sngags pas ni/ /sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed/ /gsang ba'i dngos po de nyid 'di/ /'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum gnas sbyor ba yis/ /bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgom/ /nam mkhar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /gnas

401
081-201a med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin nyid gnas sa phyogs yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsam shing / /dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan/ /sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri/ /dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba/ /rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya/ /phung sogs yan lag thams cad de/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur/ /sngags 'don par ni gang gyur pa/ /bsdus pa sngags ni gcig pu pa/ /lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni/ /rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya/ /lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum/ /de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje gsum dang lus sbyor las/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog /sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin/ /lnga bcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa/ /brgya brgya pa nas mngon phyogs la/ /ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar gcig stsol/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis/ /sa la sogs pa brgyan pa ni/ / de ni snang ba zhes bshad do/ /tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha/ /dad pas de la phyag kyang byed/ /'di ni mi snang byed pa ste/ /ting 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing / /ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par/ /mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtag /bshang gci sbyangs las de gyur pa/ /gang zhig dam tshig ces bya'o/ /dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog /mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te/ / bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum yin/ /bdag med ces bya kha yin te/ /gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du/ /bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi byed pa'i/ /sgom pa sems kyi

402
