081-201b dam pa'o/ /de ltar de nyid shes bsgoms na/ /skad cig gis rnam rdo rjer 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyis rnam bsgoms nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad/ / sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams/ /de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o/ /gnas ni lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /sna ni ri rab ces bya'o/ /bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun/ /nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi khyab/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste/ /'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi rang ngo bo/ /phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin/ /dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya/ /'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba/ /skad cig sbyor bas bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje kun gyi gnas mchog ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de snyed bud med de yi ni/ /gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che/ /drug po yis ni phyag byas 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba/ / chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i/ /ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni/ /dkyil 'khor la bdag bdag nyid 'jog /gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi/ /rdo rje pad+mo grub bcas sbyin/ /so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad/ /shin tu grangs med bskal par ni/ /grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni/ /gnas shing sgom par byed pa yin/ /de yi ye shes lngar ldan pa/ /sangs

403
081-202a rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni/ /'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i/ /yon tan gsum ni yongs su bsten/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rang sngags las byung ral gri ni/ /blo can lag pa de bzhag na/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rang gi sngags kyi khong chud 'di/ /ho ho hU~M de khams gsum pa/ /pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher/ /rnal 'byor pa de 'gyur ba yin/ /khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing / /tshangs pa lha min phyag byas pa/ /stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig pu/ /dpag chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mchog bsgoms pas/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'thob/ /rang gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di/ /dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung / /byang grol la yang de mi gnas/ /ral gri kha dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /o~M ni ri la bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /byang chub ye shes 'od po cher/ /blo ldan de ma thag de 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/ /yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo/ /de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na/ /byang chub ye shes 'od po che/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog dang / /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /nam mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshod tsam/ /yi ge hU~M ni rnam bsams te/ /dbus su rang gi lha bsams na/ /khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog dang / /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rnam par snang

404
081-202b mdzad mkha'adabyings kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang / /'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o/ /'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser mdog gam/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te/ /lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rin chen la ni rin chen bsgom/ /de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na/ / rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rin chen mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las/ /rin chen rigs kyi mchog bsgom pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+ma mchog gi bsgrub pa 'di/ /pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la/ /lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mchog ni 'di bsgrub pa/ /sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las/ /dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis byas/ / bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis/ /mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub pa yis/ /bsam gtan nyid kyis bsgrub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po 'byung ba yi/ /dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug /

405
081-203a sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid/ /'gog dang lam ni bzhi po ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad/ /sgrub pa po ni gnas ming can/ /shing gcig drung du yang dag rtog /chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can/ /sna tshogs mtshan gcig yang dag dgod/ /mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzugs can no/ /'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni/ /gnas pa yis ni nyer mdzes pa/ /yid rton pa yi mnyam sbyor la/ /rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su/ / dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par du/ /sgrub pa po ni rtag tu bsgrub/ /sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni/ /sbyor gsum rdo rje can bsam pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi/ /mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/ /gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas/ / 'gro ba 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang / /mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed/ /gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni/ /mkha' dbyings dbye bas gnas pa rnams/ /de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni/ /sngags rig pas ni spyad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje can/ /sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las/ /lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog /rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ / rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya/ /me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/ /lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /lcags kyu la sogs rab tu bsgom/ /de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod/ /de ni

406
081-203b de ma thag tu yang / /dngos grub kun ster las byed 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ /mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya/ /lce yi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /gsung gi rdo rje de mnyam bsgom/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyi nang gnyis/ gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do/ /dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /ji lta ji ltar rab bsgrub pa/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i/ /de ni yang dag yin par bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod/ / bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de skad gsungs/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje ni/ /go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs/ /gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor pa'i/ /mnyam gzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi/ /de ni de yis yang dag bshad/ /rnal 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /byas na dam tshig yang dag pa/ /sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar/ /dngos med pa yi sha chen gyi/ /dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni/ /blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod ster/ /rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin/ /de nyid ye shes dbang po gci/ /dam tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba/ /glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag /dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste/ /dngos med de nyid las sbyor las/ / dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor na/ /mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa/ /dngos med de ni khyi sha yin/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/ /dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdzogs

407
081-204a sangs rgyas spyan ba lang sha/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las/ /dgongs pas cig shos bzlog pa yin/ /sha chen dang ni bshang gci dang / /glang po rta khyi ba lang dag /mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur/ /bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni/ /sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis/ /sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing / /rnam kun rdo rje can gsum dang / /snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i/ /'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i mchog /dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya/ /dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste/ /rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin to/ /de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon/ /gtso bo rnam snang chen po la/ /gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus/ /gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni/ /gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur/ /rang gi bstan bcos brda yis ni/ /phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la/ /ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang / /'di la rang gi ngo bo med/ /tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud las ni/ /ri rab gcig dang bcas par bshad/ /byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa/ /gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis/ /rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa/ /legs so rdo rje legs pa che/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa/ /rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang / /'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag /theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo / /tshad

408
081-204b yod pa dang yongs chad pa'i/ /rang gi lus la gang bshad de/ /ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod/ /khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa/ /mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du/ /rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo / /rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste/ /de yis yang dag ma mthong bas/ /rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis/ /gzhan yod pa ni min zhes smra/ /theg pa chen la gsang ba rnams/ /srang la bcal te de smra ba/ /de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes/ / nga yi tshig las bltas te smra/ /de nyid rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bsgom pa rnams/ /gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur/ /gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub/ /sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ste/ /dgongs na ji lta ji lta bar/ /de ni nga yis yang dag bshad/ /dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni/ /rdo rje can gyis hU~M bsams te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga/ /zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ /AHdang o~M gyi gsang ba dag /'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi yi/ /phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung / /ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog /sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /de nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtsho che/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog / rdo rje bdag nyid de snang byed/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du/ /grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i/ /rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro/ /sku yi rdo rje bsgom bdag nyid/ /grub mchog dam tshig la gnas pa/ /mi snang gyur

409
081-205a pa kun gyi mchog /stong khams dag ni snang bar byed/ /lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma legs sbyor/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed ces bya ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun/ /dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu/ /sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa/ /rna ba la gnas ma nor bar/ /skad cig gis ni de kun thos/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag na/ /sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan/ /sems zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog /sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i mchog gis 'gengs/ / rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro/ /rang gi rna ba sems bcas pas/ /gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi/ /gnas kyi dngos grub bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon shes nas/ /'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to/ /mngon shes drug ni don grub pa'i/ /de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/ /'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas/ /sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni/ /'jig rten khams rnams kun tu spyod/ /yid rton bde gcig bsten pa ste/ /de nyid gsum mnyam gnyis med pa/ /bsten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa/ /ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur/ /'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/ / rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa/ /'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags/ /sems la dmigs dang 'dir sbyor ba/ /skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang / /nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang / /sgrub pa'i dam tshig

410
081-205b nyid dang ni/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin/ /'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur pa/ /ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs/ /sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs/ /lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag /chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes sgrub pa po/ /bsten pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor/ /byang chub mchog ni rnam par bsgom/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya chos rnams la/ /dngos grub mchog ni rnam dpyad pa/ /de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur/ /sngags pa gang yin bsgoms nas ni/ / bskul bar sgrub par byed pa yin/ /rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod/ /bsnyen pa rdo rje bdud rtsi gang / /sngags pas kun du brtag par bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni/ /dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang bsam/ / 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsum gsang yang dag 'byung / /sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i/ /sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten/ /sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog /sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod/ /de yi dpag bsam shing longs spyod/ /sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par dben pa chen por bshad/ /ri 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de rigs dngos med las byung ba'o/ /de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru/ / der ni 'od chen rnams gnas te/ /gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sgrub pa ni/ /chen pos de skad bka' stsal to/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sogs/ /'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal/ /bsnyen pa sku yi brtul zhugs mchog /blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis/ /rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor bas/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /me long zhes bya dgon pa che/ /rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o/ /chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med/ /don yod par ni

411
081-206a ri 'or yin/ /chu ngogs dag pa'i chos kyi cha/ /gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag /ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis/ /yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig /rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/ /de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i phyed/ /yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o/ /gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i/ /oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab/ /de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po/ /gtso bo rang nyid bzlog pa yin/ /la la glang po spangs nas ni/ /rjes la dbyibs ni tshol bar byed/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni/ /oM las sdom pa gzhan du 'dod/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dus thub de bzhin nor can dang / /phan tshun sbyor nas brjod pa las/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur/ /bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste/ /tshig tu brjod pa rnam par spangs/ /brda tsam du ni oM zhes bya/ /dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /sku gsum du ma yang dag bshad/ /gsum po yang dag 'dzin pas ni/ /des na oM ni sdom pa yin/ dang po gcig pu mi bskyod dgod/ /de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin/ /brda ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /bsams nas sdom pa kun du bshad/ /mi phyed nam mkha'i sbyor ba yin/ /bsam dang gdon dang rnam par bral/ /rten 'brel rig las yang dag 'byung / /rjes bcas zhes bya de bsgom bya/ /rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes zhig /mig la sogs pa bdun brgya la/ /g.yas dang cig shos zla phyed de/ /shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o/ /'di dag zung gyur zla ba ste/ /rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis/ /de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhag ni mi thub zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis min/ /'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas/ /rgya cher ngas ni bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog las byung ba ni/ /zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs/ /de nyid nye bar 'gyur bshad pa'i/ /sdom pa'i yul ni dam

412
081-206b pa yin/ /gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes/ /de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed 'od po che/ /byang chub skad cig gis sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sku ni byed par 'gyur/ /srog la sogs dang grangs mnyam pa'i/ /bdag med phyogs bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang / /gang zhig phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams/ /chos sku mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob/ / 'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs na bzhugs/ /sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/ /sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni/ /cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/ /'on kyang dngos med las byung ba'i/ / sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la/ /sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa/ /de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ /rig dang ma rig yang dag ldan/ /srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad/ /dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs/ /de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur/ /zla ba la sogs grangs mnyam pas/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin/ /khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis/ /lam rtsom pa ni brtags pa yis/ /de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog /sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin/ /sngags dang dngos med de byed pa/ /mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs/ /rtog pa las byung de 'di ni/ /dngos med pa ni bsgom pas so/ /ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni/ /lha yi gzugs la 'dud par byed/ /mig dang de bzhin rna ba sna/ /lce dang de bzhin lus ngag dang / /pags pa rkang par yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa/ /lta dang nyan dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya rnams ni dngos med pa/ /rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi/ /'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te/ /'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku/ /sangs rgyas byin gyi byin rlabs kyis/ /de bzhin sngags sbyor bdag

413
